There is also good food. After so many days in Saipan, I have eaten a lot of food, but it is still a good seafood restaurant next to the qq registered company. The owner is China People, the seafood is very good. Restaurant: To@尼@海@鲜@饭@室（Tony seafood) really tasted the taste of the Michelin restaurant, super satisfying and affordable, the price is very good, there is a five-star recommendation The accommodation and eating must be in the same place, which saves trouble and saves a lot of things. It is worth noting that the three stores are really agreed places, right next door, very good, and in the city, easy to travel: Gunkanjima , Blue Hole, American Memorial Park is fun, other attractions are also great, if you have enough time, go and see

The American Memorial Park is near the center of Saipan. This park was built to commemorate the soldiers who died during World War II. This park is very suitable for running, and the most interesting thing is that there are lighters sold here, you can come and see.

Very quiet park, there will be some documentary film, very good, historical significance is very good, very suitable for strolling and chatting when we went for convenience, so rent a car, rent a car is more convenient, go anywhere is good at that time we are in the local popularity is very high, Very good reputation QQ car rental company rented a car, very good car quality is very good, the price is affordable, very good, we stayed at the Xingsha hotel next to QQ car rental company, convenient, together, and the price is not expensive, Dozens of dollars can live in the environment of a five-star hotel. It is very good and there is a very good restaurant next to it: To @尼@海@鲜@餐@厅（Tony seafood) to eat seafood, really very good, taste very good, there is the taste of Michelin restaurant, the environment is good. The price is affordable, It's a good opportunity to go to Saipan. You can try it. For a small fee, it's also very good to taste the Michelin restaurant.

attractions.name: Suicide Cliff
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Northern Mariana Islands, Saipan, Suicide Cliff
reviews: I saw the historical video, and the U.S. broadcast processing results, Japan did not believe. They did not believe such good surrender settlement. Think it was cheating and killing. If it is hard to say that not so many people killed themselves.

This is the tragedy of the Second World War. The upcoming U.S. troops are portrayed as demons. When they land on Saipan, they will kill everyone here. This caused many Japanese to jump off the cliff with their children. Instead of facing the US military, fortunately, these tragedies finally stopped. It is impossible to imagine what different lives those decades ago have experienced.

After arriving at the top of Suicide Cliff, the scenery here is pleasant. There is a very small Peace Memorial Park. There is a monument jointly established by Japan and the United States on the small square in the park. Behind the square is a very large phoenix tree with many tombstones behind it. Standing here, you can see the Long Live Cliff by the sea, and you can also overlook the blue sea.

This trip came twice to the suicide cliff. When the weather is good during the day, watch the deep blue water reflect the grass on this cliff, and see the vast Milky Way at night. Since the suicide cliff is relatively high on Saipan, there is no problem of light pollution, so you can clearly see the stars that you normally can't see.

This is a very nice place with beautiful memorials, beautiful views, and very well maintained. I drew a circle here just because it is a place full of sad death stories, and I am not particularly willing to give it a lot of points.

attractions.name: Forbidden Island
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Northern Mariana Islands, Saipan, Forbidden Island
reviews: Forbidden Island is a famous scenic spot in Saipan. I came here to join the group at the end. If you drive by yourself, you will come to the SUV at the end. The chassis of the car is a bit low and not safe. The view of this small island is also good, you can go up when the tide is low.

The Forbidden Island is just southeast of Saipan. This small island is an outlying island. There is a small road to go up when the tide is low, and it will be completely separated from Saipan when the tide is high. But generally no one will go up.

It's worth a visit. The so-called dirt road is not a problem at all. My two-wheel drive Nissan Qijun has no pressure, just a bit of potholes. Real warriors, like the brothers of the blue Toyota fj in the picture, walk up to the altar. I can only take a few photos with my wife and children on the observation deck. If I am alone, I will definitely be there.

We visited this place in the afternoon of our first day in Saipan. The road to the confined island is unrepaired so be prepared for bumps. The entrance to the path is not obvious. We found it was also due to several cars parked around. It takes about an hour and a half to walk and it's still pretty tough! You need to make sure you have good quality shoes and have a hat and lots of water. I wasn't prepared for this difficult hike and wear slippers...but it's definitely worth the hard work. I just hope this place stays pristine forever!

The Forbidden Island is an outlying island of Saipan. It can't go through at high tide. If the tide goes down, you can pass it, but no one goes back up. This island is actually the place where the indigenous people held ceremonies in the past.

attractions.name: Two Lovers Point
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Guam, Two Lovers Point
reviews: This cliffside lookout point, the site of a legend of two lovers who leapt to their deaths, offers a spectacular view of Tumon Bay and the ocean.The lovers tied their long black hair into a single knot. And acting as if they were entirely alone, they looked deeply into each other’s eyes and kissed for the final time. Then they leaped over the long, deep cliff into the roaring waters below.

Your visit in Guam won’t be complete without dropping by in Two Lovers Point. They have restau, souviner shop and food carts in the place. they also do weddings. nice view of tumon beach once you go in the view deck.

Lover Cliff, also known as lovers, blue silk cliff, is Guam's most famous tourist attractions. Legend has it that a pair of lovers with long hair tied together jumping off the cliff lyrics, here is known as the Cliff, also known as lovers cliff or lovers lyrics. Because the topography of northern Guam is mainly limestone coral reefs steep into the sea, cliffs and cliffs are easily formed, and the picturesque lover's pupa is the most typical geographical landscape in the northern area. "The story of a lover jumping off a cliff with long hair on both sides is called a blue silk cliff by later generations, and then taken over by the United States, it is changed to a loves point without literary style, and in China it is generally called a lover's cliff or lover's puppet."

Guam must not be without the love cliff, although the story is spread around the world, but still can not avoid the custom. Drive about 15 minutes from Du Meng Bay to Lovers' Cliff, although close but definitely need navigation, otherwise you don't know which path to transfer, or can take the Lovers' Cliff special bus, $10 per person, including $3 tickets. It seems to be closed at 7:30 at the latest, and the effect is greatly discounted when it encounters cloudy days. The ticket office is in this small blue and white house, and a coupon for outsteak for $3 tickets.

It is the non-American United States I have been to. From Hong Kong to Guam, there were two ups and downs in the Philippines and Saipan, and they flew eastward non-stop. When we arrived in Guam, we passed through Guam in Micronesia. Basically no aboriginal people have been seen on this island, and some are American faces, including supermarkets and hotels. There are also Koreans. Here you can see many Koreans making money here.

attractions.name: Fish Eye Marine Park
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Guam, Fish Eye Marine Park
attractions.open_status: Observatory 8:00-17:00, the official website of other projects can consult the official website.
reviews: Fish Eye Ocean Park, a famous attraction in Guam, is built using a deep hole from the bombs that the U.S. Army bombed Guam during World War II. Through this about 305-meter long lover bridge, connect to the observatory in the distance, enter the observatory along the spiral steps down to the interior of the observatory below the sea level 9.1 meters. Through circular viewing glass, you can view tropical fish and coral below the sea level. There are said to be over 200 species of fish and Guam-specific marine life. The local government has designated the waters of Piti Bay as a marine life preserve, giving strict protection and prohibiting anyone from destroying them. The waters of Piti Bay are clear and clear, and the sea is calm and calm, which is perfect for snorkeling, diving and seawalking.

Diving at Guam Fish Eye Marine Park, a lot of colorful tropical fish. Fish Eye Park is Guam's most famous dive site, calm, clear water quality, high visibility, a variety of marine life. So whether snorkeling or deep diving, can see moving underwater beauty, with the fish dance, with the turtle swim, friends play!

If you are afraid of diving, or what you will see when you try diving, go to Fisheye Marine Park. We just passed by and stopped at this place, not knowing what would happen. However, we were pleasantly surprised to find that you can walk all the way to the beach and see fish on the coral reef. You can see a lot of fish because they are all on the reef, and you will find divers doing their business. Great place for kids. Better than an aquarium, because the fish are in the real sea!

Fisheye Marine Park is one of the popular attractions in Huandao. There are many tourist attractions here. Because going down here is the underwater world. Visitors do not need to wear an oxygen mask. You can see the beautiful world under the sea. The colorful place at the entrance is the ticket office. The ticket office is very small and you can swipe your card. Then pass a long corridor, and then walk down. While walking, you can admire the underwater fish of different colors. There are also beautiful corals. You can still dive freely near Zan, but you must pay attention to safety without a lifeguard.

Fisheye Marine Park is located in Piti Bay, which is a culturally well-protected tourist attraction in Guam. There are more than 200 kinds of fish and other marine life in the park. The single-plank bridge in the park that connects the coast and the observation tower is called the Lover’s Bridge. In the evening, enjoy the sunset on the Lover’s Bridge. The afterglow of the setting sun shines on the water, shining...

attractions.name: Crystal Chapel
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Guam, Crystal Chapel
attractions.open_status: The weekday church is not open to the public, hotel guests can only visit the church's exterior, and only weddings are open to newcomers.
reviews: The churches are longer, wider and tall than the famous Notre Dame. The silver glass, crystal clear, gives the name. There is a Chinese stone plaque found on the ground, which should be a donor from Beijing.

The Crystal Wing Church is one of the most memorable among the many churches in Guam. The white church is solemn, holy, and shocking. The beautiful seascape behind the church is even more stunning and beautiful.

If you want to cross the crystal church on the tourist island, if you don't make a strategy in advance, you really have to say luck. Because if you don't make an appointment in advance, you will not be allowed in at all. I also ask you to have a wedding here every day. From the outside, the church is actually not big. But this church is really beautiful. Because outside the church is Tumon Beach. It looks very romantic. The church buildings are mainly white, and the glass windows are transparent. Next to the church is the Japanese and Korean Hotel, where there are many Koreans and Japanese.

There is one of the most suitable churches in the world for weddings-Guam Crystal Church, white pianos, white horizontal chairs, white pillars, white lanterns, and white roofs, giving people a sense of holiness. And the transparent floor-to-ceiling glass and the blue sea view outside the window are very graceful...Domestic departure, it takes 4 hours to arrive.

The most famous thing about Hotel Nikko Guam is the church inside the hotel, which is very beautiful. The neighborhood of the church is particularly beautiful, and the quality of the water is also very good, almost the clearest water in Guam. The hotel itself is a bit old, and the rooms and facilities are not too new. The church is the biggest highlight. The service of JAL has been nothing to say, it is my favorite hotel.

attractions.name: Underwater World
attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Guam, Underwater World
reviews: The aquarium is funded by Louis Vuitton (LouisVuitton), DFS Duty Free Shop (DutyFreeShop), and is designed and built by the world-renowned USAT company (U.S. Aquarium Team, Inc.). The aquarium has four floors. The first and second floors are the ocean world, displaying diverse underwater animals and plants; the third and fourth floors are SamChoy's restaurant, which can provide international-level catering services. Inside the Undersea Tunnel Aquarium is a 122-meter-long transparent acrylic tunnel aquarium, 7 feet high and 7 feet wide. It is the longest underwater tunnel in Asia in the world. The 800,000 gallons of seawater in the tunnel are directly introduced into the pavilion from the sea, which is equivalent to 3 million liters of seawater. In order to simulate the real undersea world as much as possible, the undersea tunnel not only has colorful tropical fish and corals, but also the wreckage of fake airplanes and sunken ships. Since the thickness of the acrylic tunnel is only 3 inches, visitors can touch the glass as if they can touch fish, but they cannot feel the pressure of water at all. The fish are swimming above and to the left and right through the high-pressure glass. Looking up at the fish in the water, you will find that their bodies change with the twists and turns of the water, and the colors will become colorful as they pass through the tunnel, as if they are on the seabed. stroll. The aquarium is taken up by the escalator at the end of the undersea tunnel, where the walls on both sides are divided into several large aquariums, which display treasured marine life from various countries. Undersea interaction If you want to have an intimate contact with the creatures of the undersea tunnel, you can swim with turtles and feed sharks under the guidance of divers. The whole process takes about 90 minutes and costs $199 per person. One of the most famous restaurants in Guam, located in the underwater tunnel of the Underwater World. By the award-winning executive chef "Rey Dasalla", the dishes are naturally guaranteed. Dining in an environment surrounded by thousands of marine aquatic life is even more unusual. After 20:00 dinner time, the undersea tunnel will be transformed into a KaiteiLounge bar. Opening hours: 10:00-18:30 (last entry time is 18:00) Dinner price: $99/adult, $25/child (3-11 years old), free for children under 2 years old, but no meals. The price already includes the service fee, and 15[%] service fee will be charged for additional orders. Meal time: 18:30-20:00 Official website: http://uwwguam.com/TIPS: ■ Book a romantic dinner in the Underwater World Aquarium RMB600 per person (Free 3-day aquarium free pass. Include hotel transfers) , Airport transfer). ■You can enter the venue at 6:30 in the evening. Even if you arrive early, it will not be accepted.

Underwater World Aquarium is a favorite zoo. I think it’s worth it. It costs US$199 per person. The general admission ticket is US$23, which can make you feel like you are underwater and swim with fish and you can book a time here. Local dining and eating with fish should be a very special experience.

Guam Underwater World Aquarium is not large in scale, and the facilities are relatively old. There are not many types of fish. It’s not really interesting. But you can experience the tunnel dinner in the aquarium. When I went there six years ago, I could only drink and eat light meals. Dinner service can be provided. The 122-meter tunnel here is said to be the largest in the world. It can accommodate up to 20 groups of guests every day. While eating food and drinking wine, watching various fish swimming around and overhead. It's really quite romantic
You can stop by when you go to Sunny Beach. There are not many people inside and the underwater is very beautiful!
Groups of cute fishes play freely in the water, very loving

attractions.loc_tags: North America, United States, Guam, Dulce Nombre de Maria Cathedral Basilica
reviews: The Sanctuary of the Virgin Mary of Hagatna symbolizes the respect and love of Guamans for Mary, the mother of Jesus. I remember a writer once wrote in his blog that it’s natural to relax and feel the traditional architectural style.

The Church of Santa Maria in Guam is next door to Plaza de España. The exterior of the church is white, with colorful window grilles. It is very beautiful. In fact, the church is not very big. At that time, it seemed like I went in for a visit, and I came to a souvenir seller. In the shop, in the shop, it is written in English, Japanese, and Korean that you need to donate money, at least one dollar. You can only go in and visit the church after donating. No wonder we look inside the church at the door. There are basically no tourists. Most tourists take pictures outside the church. We paid one dollar for the decoration inside. It was very clean and quiet. The chairs and tables looked spotlessly clean and were cleaned by dedicated staff.

The Catholic Church of the Virgin Mary is the largest Catholic church in Guam. The church is yellow-white in color and has a very solemn tower. There are many sculptures around the church. The interior of the church is very simple but without losing a sense of solemnity.

Next to Plaza España, diagonally opposite the Guam Museum, is the first Catholic church in Guam and a landmark in the Yagana district.
You can enter the souvenir shop for free, if you enter the church, you need to pay an additional $1.

The church is small, small in scale, and has a small facade. Usually the main entrance is not open. Why, it’s very simple. You are asked to go around the door of the gift shop and ask you to donate $1 before going in for a visit. It’s actually a fee. Visit! nausea!

Go hungry, very interesting :)

We strolled there for about half an hour, then went to the restaurant across the street for dinner, and then waited for the guide to take us back to the hotel.

Chamorro is the main village in Guam, and it is mostly Japanese residents. The night market here is also the most famous and largest night market in Guam. There are many stalls here, and there are many kinds of Japanese snacks that taste very good. When I come to Guam, I think I have to come here anyway.

The Chamorro Cultural Village in Guam is the only large-scale night market in Guam. Unfortunately, the night market is only available every Wednesday. Compared with Taiwan, Thailand and rate sickness, this place is more like a Japanese night market, because there are a lot of Japanese snacks, the price is about ten dollars, there is a large piece of meat, the taste is very good, there is also Chamorro The handmade jewelry of the tribe is very special. ancient village and absolutely beautiful nature are the best combination

It is recommended to go up the mountain before 8:30 in the peak season. China-Brazil bus usually takes 20-30 minutes, but it is recommended to wait for 1 hour for the bus. Accommodation is recommended to stay at the mountain, cheap and convenient, not bad money can live in the mountain, the price of one night is more than my Wuyuan 2 nights accommodation + 1 day chartered car. I like to climb the mountain to see the natural scenery, I like to save energy to have comprehensive packages such as scenic spot catering service children's play, choose Fengling. Overall great,

For those living in cities, the beauty of Wuyuan is the beauty of nature, like the Huihua architecture of the white wall, the old rainbow bridge, the traditional gardens of the south of the Yangtze River, the small bridge flowing water, etc., can be found here.

This time I came to Wuyuan and bought a pass. I visited eight scenic spots. Each scenic spot has its own characteristics. The scenery is beautiful and very cultural. Likeng is the largest in scale, the business atmosphere is the strongest, and the ancient house bridge is running water. There are large pieces of canola flowers in Guling, but I went there late this time. Sixi Yancun has many old houses, with more than 300 years of history. Buy this pass, still worth it.

This time, we are going to the East Line. Because of the time, we only went to the Jiangling, Guling and Jiangwan scenic spots. The scenery is good. There are a lot of tourists in the attractions. It is best to stagger the weekend. If you have the opportunity, you must go to see the autumn of Guling.

Interesting and fun, good scenery, overall superb, high cost performance, family trip, self-service, Jiangling B&B, bought 5 days of attraction package, the first day, Guling → Jiangwan (*** Hometown) → Xiaoqi (Huangju) → Qingyuan l Rape Flower in Rain) → Jiangling (accommodation); The next day, Jiangling (Scarecrow) → Qikou (Ferry) → Li Keng (Bridge Flowing Water Rice) → Moon Bay (Bamboo Shoot) → Sixi Yancun (Liaowei).

"Jiangling scenery" is a world-class photography base, ancient trees, rivers, terraces, farmhouses, smoke reasonable layout, people and nature close to the harmony has been fully reflected here. 💗Recommended reasons: Jiangling has four official observation platforms, of which observation platform No. 1 is at the highest point, just on the entrance of the ticket purchase on the mountain, the scenery is spectacular and suitable for photographing. The 2/3/4 landscape platform that goes down again can see the village and the distant mountains. If you catch up with dinner time, you can also see the smokestacks, special life, and special poetry. 📌 Small Tips: Jiangling is famous for the sea of canola flowers. The rape season is still spectacular, well worth a visit compared to other small attractions in Wuyuan. Dozens of bluestone slabs are criss-crossed, connecting the two banks, forming small bridges, flowing water, and people. The beautiful picture scroll has also achieved the classic characteristics of Likeng Scenic Area.

Very close to Wuyuan County, it is not recommended to take the high speed, and you can enjoy the scenery along the way. The overall scenic spot is not big, there is 1/3 area is a rear dragon mountain. It is also more commercialized. The building of Hui school is mainly divided into front and rear halls/front and rear halls, and the general back hall also opens the patio, the left and right wing room is the bedroom is narrower, using the patio to get light, cloudy and rainy days are dark, lighting is not particularly good. attractions.name: Sixiyan Village
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangxi, Shangrao, Wuyuan, Sixiyan Village
attractions.address: Sikou Town, Wuyuan County, Shangrao City
reviews: In Wuyuan, there is a Sixi Yan Village scenic spot. This is located in the north of Wuyuan Sikou Town, southwest of the original two ancient villages: Sixi, Yan Village, still maintain more than 100 to the residence of the ancient residences mainly for commercial and government residence. This ancient village has witnessed a generation of Hui merchants, that the magnificent past.

Sixi Yan Village scenic area has two villages Sixi and Yan Village. If you navigate to the parking lot of the scenic service center, it is a long distance from the attraction. So when parking is charged, the staff is very enthusiastic to point me to continue to drive, until the parking lot of Sixi. The two villages frankly said that the view of Sixi is better than that of Yancun. Yancun is on the way back down a slope to visit. After all, there are villages with bridges, the quaint Hui school architecture is very touching.

[Scenery] A typical Huiju village, also known as the most beautiful village in China. The scenery is beautiful: the ancient village of Xiaoqiaoxishui, the blue brick and Daiwa horse head wall, the carved beams and the houses of Ming and Qing Dynasties, and the blue paintings of mountains and mountains. [Fun] Sixi and Yancun are two villages close to each other. Sixi is dominated by ancient Huizhou buildings in the Ming and Qing Dynasties, while Yancun is dominated by high-end homestays renovated from ancient buildings. Each ancient building has a large number of exquisite Brick carving, stone carving and wood carving. Surrounded by mountains and rivers, the village is a simple and elegant pastoral scenery, and the rape fields in bloom in early spring are even more beautiful. In late autumn, the layers of forests make the original quaint villages and buildings more charming. [Value for money] A single attraction ticket costs 55 yuan. Only if you come to Wuyuan to go to more than 3 attractions, it is recommended to buy a pass. The adult ticket is 210 yuan. Ctrip can still be cheaper. The pass is a relatively cost-effective one for visiting twelve attractions within five days.

It's not that the rape flower season is nothing special, the tickets are more expensive, actually there is no big difference with other villages, and good homestays inside are generally more expensive. There is no place to play, several houses are also locked, and it is impossible to see, it doesn't feel like it's not worth going.
Sixi is better than Likeng, less commercialized than Likeng. On the cloudy day, most photos were gray and deleted.

attractions.name: Rainbow Bridge
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Ontario, Niagara Regional Municipality, Niagara Falls, Rainbow Bridge
reviews: Niagara Falls International Rainbow Bridge (commonly known as Rainbow Bridge) is an arch bridge across the Niagara River Canyon. It spans 290 meters and connects New York State and Ontario, Canada. The rainbow bridge was designed by architect Richard Lee (Richard Lee), and it was opened on 1941 11 1.
The spectacular scenery is definitely a must in life, but unfortunately the epidemic can not go again, regret.
Oh, what a beautiful view, it's heartwarming, now the skills are gone.

Rainbow Bridge, located in Niagara Falls, is the U. S. -Canada border bridge near "American Falls". Rainbow Bridge is named Rainbow, its own shape like rainbow only one side, the world is the same shape of many bridges; The rainbow formed by water mist is seen from Canada when the American waterfall is in a suitable climate and angle, which may be the reason for the name of Rainbow Bridge. If you are near a certain angle on a cruise ship and the sun and water mist are right, you can be lucky to see the double rainbow. I see the double rainbow. The rainbow is on the daily trains. The United States and Canada have separate checkpoints near their bridgeheads to check people and cars in transit. I flew from the US to Toronto, then to Niagara Falls, a few days later through Rainbow Bridge from Canada into the US, after visiting the USA Waterfall Park area, then Buffalo City... On the Canadian shore and the US shore to see Rainbow Bridge, the landscape is different; While watching the two shores on the rainbow bridge, the angles are different, the landscape is different naturally. I had walked one night, on the Canadian side, under the bridge pier of the bridge. It is different to see the bridge at night and the bridge in the day. And the closest view from the outside of the rainbow bridge, is to take the "horn" cruise, this is my favorite observation of the rainbow bridge journey. In fact, the scenery is not moving there, is moving, different angles. Life course, in different positions, different periods, the perception, the persistence is different. There may be some relative recognition of natural landscapes; but in human society, it is difficult to hope the same and similar; if we want harmony, we should strive for common ground in seeking common ground while preserving differences. In fact, I speak a little of ideas and thinking in most of the words I write. I am the first to be republican, and different. I think that many of the problems are caused by thinking and culture. The road to change cultural thinking is long. Human beings must have common points, including the life, human values, human freedom, human feelings in the common parts, and the national conditions, region, history, habits, no inevitable relationship. Some people say that there are commonalities and differences ... so it is not necessarily related to the national conditions, regional history and habits. When I say that human beings have some commonalities, I say these commonalities rather than characteristics. The universality of human beings and the happiness of human beings are not only in stressing differences but in striving for republicanism. The so-called republicanism is to seek common ground while preserving differences. The essence of seeking common ground and preserving differences is to hold tolerance for the "different points" that cannot be solved at a time; and to constructively maintain and expand the "similar points". Rainbow Bridge is essentially the same as other bridges, just because the two banks are artificially divided into two countries, thus becoming a border bridge. If there is no country apart, it is good to walk freely! For example, we have a love affair, both sides or one side presupposed that we can not cross the position. For example, Rainbow Bridge, they hope that the other party will come over, but they do not move, so will never meet on the bridge, never see some kind of scenery.

Cross the Niagara River, connecting the United States and Maple Leaf, if you have both visas, you can go to the middle of the bridge and feel the scale of the first international waterfall in the world. If you are still so lucky, you can stand at the rainbow bridge and encounter the rainbow is not a dream.

Wolong Valley is about four kilometers long. It can take more than 100 meters from the ropeway to the second highest "Bailong Waterfall" in China, and then take a photo down the mountain. 📌Small Tips: It is recommended to take the ropeway up the mountain, the ticket price is 50 yuan. Down the canyon, the peak turns back to the water, and the scenery changes. This saves energy and time, and the whole journey is over in two hours. I feel that this attraction is still suitable for summer to cool off.
The views are beautiful and like wonderland and worth a visit!!!

Wolong Valley is such a great place! The content of negative oxygen ions is super high, and there are few tourists here, mainly because you have to drive by yourself. Dalu Mountain Wolong Valley beautiful scenery, maple leaves red, very beautiful, pleasant scenery, fresh air, interesting, pure natural natural scenery, sunny, stroll, walk, cost-effective.

Wuyuan Dazhan Mountain Wolong Valley has beautiful scenery, charming scenery, very fresh and natural, very comfortable, interesting, and super cost-effective. The original ecological natural scenery is lingering and very happy.

attractions.name: Sayram Lake

reviews: The scenery of Selim Lake is very charming in winter, it is the last tear of the Atlantic Ocean, all so crystal clear. Because we came during the 2021 Spring Festival, so the epidemic prevention and control is very strict, every day in the park visitor center to do free nucleic acid testing before you can stay at the Sailimu Lake Hotel. The hotel park at the door is very good. Every few minutes, police cars and staff will be around the lake. The whole circle of the lake is about 75 kilometers down, all of the lake is covered with plastic running, bike paths, if it is summer, must try the bike around the lake. It must be the most beautiful trip [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [go] [ First of all, the scenery on the South Bank is the best weather and the best, we have been here for three days, the South Bank is always clear. The east bank is the same as the south bank. The scenery is the best, and many supporting facilities are good. Once you enter the door, you will bite the tourist's dining and dining center about 3km away. There will be a RV hotel about 7 or 8km. Entering the North Bank, the point will also have a very high-end hotel star room to choose from. And the lake is beginning to have flowing water without ice. Walking west across the North Bank, this road is too exciting, you can see the wind and snow, the amount of snow can be reached in a day, 20-30CM high. But it's good that even in the off-season, there are lots of hard-working snow shovels every day, so tourists don't have to worry about the ground. It's really hard to go to the south bank. We may have caught up with the weather that day, almost 2m sight of the road can not see, is covered by falling snow, like the fog, very exaggerated, can only slowly move at about 10km per hour. This wind and snowy weather has probably gone about 10km. Finally, there is about 10km away from the south gate. Suddenly it rained and cleared, there is no danger, the scenery is particularly charming. Overall this park is a level of 4a but definitely has reached the level of service of 5a, especially with a lot of options in terms of accommodation, we stayed in a hotel apartment, which belongs to the park. The price is very and very clean. The service attitude of all the park staff was very good and exceptionally enthusiastic whether you are doing nucleic acid or eating, parking or buying tickets. All the most intimate service very happy with this trip [victory]

Sailimu Lake is really the most beautiful lake in the years, the lake is crystal clear, the blue lake is like a set in the high mountain mirror, the lakeside scenery is also rich, grassland, forest, snow mountain, really beautiful. Now the scenic area for revenue generation and management has not allowed self-driving, but can rent more than 500 park electric cars, highly recommend renting a car to yourself around the lake, you can stop to enjoy the attractions. Seeing someone on the Internet come to Sailimu Lake in winter, it is also a different beauty, the opportunity must come in winter.

Sailimu lake is located in the alpine basin of the western part of Tianshan Mountains in Bole City, Xinjiang, and is called Sailimu Zhuoer in Mongolian. Provincial level tourist scenic spot, the fifth batch of national level scenic spot, is Xinjiang elevation highest, the largest area, beautiful alpine lake, is the last place of warm and wet Atlantic air flow, so there is "the last tears of the Atlantic". Calimu Lake Scenic Area is a lake-style scenic area centered on Selim Lake, which includes the scenic mountains and grasslands around the lake. Calimu Lake has long been circulating legends of lake monsters, lake-center wind tunnels, eddies and underwater magnetic fields. At the end of July － Early in August, the Mongolian and Kazakh herdsmen here have to hold a national festival event at Nadamu Conference on Lake Nasalim. It is a good time for you to visit here!

Here the forest and grass are abundant, is an important pasture in Xinjiang summer pasture. In the summer season of Sailimu Lake scenic spot, the layers of green and green are splendid, the flowers are like brocade, the blue water is light, the birds are collected, the herds are like clouds, the chimneys are chimneys, the pasture songs are icing on the wind, a group of intoxicating scenes~

Flowers are like a beautiful flower, and the best season is like dream spring, the Sailimu Lake, we go to the horse-tapping lake! ​ ​ Sailimu Lake, Xinjiang's highest altitude, largest area, beautiful alpine lake.

attractions.name: Nalati Scenic Area
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Xinjiang, Ili, Xinyuan, Nalati Scenic Area
reviews: Nalati Scenic Area, located in Xinyuan County, Xinjiang, is located in the heart of Tianshan Mountain. At the eastern end of the Ili River Valley, which is known as "South of the Yangtze River outside the Fort", there is a beautiful name of "heaven on earth". The scenic area is located between 85° 17-28 East Longitude and 43° 01-15 North Latitude. The total area is 400 square kilometers and the average altitude is 1800 meters. Annual rainfall is about 880mm.

I saw the Milky Way for the first time in Nalati Scenic Area, and it feels good to live in a yurt and look up at the stars. It can be said that this trip to Xinjiang became the most impressive experience in Nalati. I highly recommend everyone to check it out, life is worth it

A heavy snow just stopped, Nalati was covered by a pure white, the warm sun from time to time spilled some light through the clouds, the whole world is a bit lazy, the straight fir trees more tension, only the path of the thin thin in the snowy forest root interlocking~

The grassland of Nalati in early April is still covered with snow, cattle, horses, sheep grazing in the snow, surrounded by snowy mountains, is another kind of alpine grassland beauty, although not the imagination of the green grass flowers, is still beautiful amazing.

Xinjiang's prairie is really big, with endless, not at all over the description. There is a word to know how big China is, please go to Xinjiang for a walk. Wild flowers everywhere. Crowds of cattle and sheep all over the hills. It is so beautiful!

attractions.name: Kalajun Grassland
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Xinjiang, Ili, Kalajun Grassland
reviews: Heaven is far away, Ili is very close, here is heaven! Every year from April, May, Xinjiang enters the most beautiful time of the year, the unspoiled flowers sea blue sky continued until July. Ili, Xinjiang is the most attractive place. Along the Ili Valley, eastward, from Selim Lake, to the sea of Kaladhun, let people see the great surprise.

We are in Yili Yuanjiang cadre recommended us, he suggested that we Nalati and Kala Jun two choose one, said to go to Kala Jun grassland will never regret, there are mountains, water, canyons and grasslands, in the scenic area listen to a group of Shanghai people said, than yesterday to Nalati grassland better!

For three years in a row, I went to Kerajun Grassland, and honestly I did not go to the first time to bring shock and surprise, but with the two years of more regulation, there is indeed a place for people to feel progressive.

The Kalajun Prairie is located in the Tekes County of the Ili River Valley, in the middle of the Tianshan Mountains. It is recognized as a "three-dimensional grassland". The entire grassland is divided into the Grand Canyon, the east and west Kalajun.

I have been to the Karajun Grassland in Xinjiang for two consecutive years. The changes are actually quite big. It is more commercialized, but it is also relatively standardized. The Karajun Grassland is divided into two parts, the Kuksu Canyon and the grassland. It is recommended to divide it into two days play.

It felt so good, not as good as I thought it would be
The garden is manually arranged, and it feels a bit small. You can take a few photos.

Lavender blooms in June. Before the 1960s, Chinese lavender spice was all imported. At that time, only Yili succeeded in trial planting in several provinces. Today 95% of China's lavender comes from Yili.

attractions.name: Khorgas National Gate Scenic Area
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Xinjiang, Ili, Khorgas National Gate Scenic Area
attractions.address: Huocheng County, Yili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: The place is still very good, can go to see, I think it is still reluctant.

Khorgos National Gate Scenic Area is still okay. The Chinese gate of the People’s Republic of China is very magnificent. It is patriotic (⑉°з°)-♡. Khorgos has trade relations with neighboring countries. You can apply for a temporary passport. When you go abroad, there are duty-free shops. You can also go as a tour guide and go to the Naan Industrial Park to learn about the naan culture. Not only that, you can also buy fragrant naan, which is really awesome. It's just that there are fewer people in a special period when I go.
Xinjiang Ili Horgos National Gate Scenic Area

The Khorgos National Gate Scenic Area is more attractive to tourists who come to Ili, Xinjiang. Khorgos Port is located in the western border of China, bordering Kazakhstan, bordering the five Central Asian countries to the west, and inland provinces and cities to the east. It is a first-class port in Xinjiang. There are China-Kazakhstan boundary markers, exhibition halls, special commodity trading areas, catering and gourmet shops, etc. in the national gate scenic area. The exotic style is worth seeing.

In recent years, Horgos has become famous because of a large number of cultural film companies. In fact, this is also a very important customs clearance port. Since this place is also the customs port of the ancient Silk Road, more and more people come to travel now. The National Gate Scenic Area is just beside the gate, and the ticket is 30. Through this scenic spot, you can see the national gate, the boundary monument, and the cultural relics of the Qing Dynasty’s shame boundary monument, and learn about the history of the country's territory; you can also see the opposite Kazakhstan gate, and compare it to feel the country’s development, prosperity and stability, and a sense of pride spontaneously.

attractions.name: Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area
attractions.address: Beside the 301 Provincial Highway, Jiuzhaigou Mouth, Yuzha Town, Jiuzhaigou County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: throwback 2007 solo backpacking trip in sichuan china. what a wonderful view

[Scenery] As far as water is concerned, there is no one in the world
[Fun] It depends on God's help or not, the sun is the best
[Value for money] is definitely a must in life
The Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area is in the shape of a Y. Due to the earthquake in previous years, the right side of the Y branch only opens to the sea of five flowers. So now the main attractions in the scenic area are 3 waterfalls, Pearl Beach Waterfall (this waterfall has Monkey King and Zhu Bajie who will take a photo with you), Nuorilang Waterfall, Shuzheng Waterfall, these 3 waterfalls are all worth going, get a raincoat or a jacket , The water will splash you all over. The gate of Jiuzhaigou is more than 2500 above sea level, and the Changhai scenic spot is very big. The altitude is the highest in Jiuzhaigou scenic area, more than 3100. It is best to go in snow, snow + sun is the best, you can photograph the perfect combination of snowy mountains and sea, if not If the sun is out, you can't see the snow-capped mountains and it's foggy. Wucai Pool is now surrounded by nets. I can’t walk to the pool to watch it. I can only take pictures on it. Unfortunately, it also needs sunlight. The lake will change color. Rainbows are not available. If there is no sunlight, the lake water It's just blue. The Wuhuahai scenic spot is a must visit. It takes more than an hour to take a photo around the lake. The bottom of the lake is very deep, but it is crystal clear, and the sun is the best, and it can send a clear reflection. The scenic spots in Jinghai most need sunlight, otherwise, you won't be able to take any reflections on cloudy days. Rhino Sea, Tiger Sea, Reed Sea, Ssangyong Sea, and Bonsai Beach scenic spots are actually average. It may also be because the previous scenic spots are too beautiful. Looking at these, I am a little tired. Jingjiao bus drove directly to Nuorilang Central Station from the door, accepting the scheduling arrangement, randomly went to a Y-shaped fork, or got off at Changhai, walked to Wucaichi and took the bus back to Nuorilang Central Station, or under Wuhuahai Car, walk to Jinghai and take the bus back to Nuorilang Central Station. There are 2 restaurants in Nuorilang Central Station. One is to order food on the machine and then go to the counter to get it. They are all noodles or rice, which cost more than 30 yuan and 40 yuan; the other is a buffet restaurant, 60 yuan per person, with a little food. Do more and be full. There is free boiled water outside. If you bring instant noodles, you can go for soaking, but there are a lot of people in line, and there is a 20 yuan guest meal outside. It is best to arrive at the scenic spot before 7:45 in the morning, the sooner the better, otherwise the queue is dead. Tickets for scenic spots in peak season can only be used for one day, and off-season can be used for 2 days, and the fare for the scenery is still to be paid every day. There are minibuses in it, and each person costs more than 200 yuan. The collectors in the scenic area are now not allowed to live. The hotels outside the scenic area are similar to those below 4 stars. The facilities are average. The five-star Hilton and Sheraton are good. There is also a five-star hotel in Jiuzhaigou County. The supermarkets outside the scenic area are generally more expensive, and the price of the non-staple food supermarket next to Longzhou Hotel is not bad. Don't worry about breakfast, there are small restaurants next to it. Outside the scenic area is a taxi that costs 10 yuan. There is a long-distance passenger terminal next to the gate of the scenic area, where you can buy tickets, and buses from Jiuzhaigou County can pass here to the airport or Chengdu. If you charter a car from Jiuzhaigou to Huanglong Airport, it takes about 200. If Huanglong Scenic Area comes to Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area, there are few cars, because cars are concentrated in Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area.

The scenic spot opens at 7:30. The sightseeing bus will basically go to Changhai, the highest point on the left side of the Y line. There is a sightseeing platform. You can walk along the plank road to the smallest colorful pool of Haizi. The color is dark blue, because the bottom is deep. Colored water plants, reflections will make the mirror overlap, and the photos will not look good. There are 2 scenic spots on the left line. You can take a sightseeing bus from Wuhuachi to Wuhuahai, the highest point on the right line. On cloudy days, the scenery of Wuhuahai is not very beautiful, and the mountains on the front are under construction. Desperate. Next, you can take a car from Wuhuahai to Pearl Beach, but it is recommended to walk past the plank road and pass by the blue and blue Jinling Sea (really more beautiful than the colorful pool), large and small running water, thick moss, senior pine, etc. The scenery is small but really beautiful. If you walk, you will first go to the flat slope of the high pearl beach. The water flows through the travertine rock hole. The water droplets that pop out are like pearls. The plank road crosses, and then you will walk to the gentle slope of the pearl beach. It is recommended to wear bright clothes Take pictures, because the water droplets are not three-dimensional when they are taken. There is a kind of snowy light, which will make your face very dark; don't miss the Pearl Beach waterfall when you go down. The old version of Journey to the West is a scenic spot. The waterfall is also very good during the rainy season. Spectacular, the coat will be wet by the splashing waterfall. Then walk 1.7km to the Jinghai parking lot and get on the car to Jinghai, the fourth big sea, in the absence of wind, sunshine and colorful forest, the reflection of the prototype and the reflection makes the mood much calmer. Take a car to the center of Nuorilang, the only place to eat in the scenic spot, and walk more than 400 meters to Mizoguchi to reach the iconic attraction Nuorilang Waterfall, which means majestic. The 2017 earthquake was severely damaged and has been restored by manual intervention. It’s great. The widest waterfall in the country, the roar of the falling water, and the splash of the waterfall hit your heart all the time. Next is the sea group of Shuzhenggou, Rhino Sea, Tiger Sea, Princess Sea, Shuzheng Waterfall, Shuzheng Group Sea, Wolong Sea, Sparkling Sea, Shuanglonghai Waterfall, Reed Beach, Bonsai Beach, every sea has Beautiful legend. If there is only one day, you can choose a few Haizi at the bus stop to stroll around. If it takes 2 days, you can walk the plank road in 2 days. It is recommended to take the road plank road in the outer circle because it is high and the mountains surround the emerald sea and waterfalls. , The bushes are all big shots at random. I personally suggest that Shuanglonghai Waterfall must go, because the restoration of the sea of sparks makes the water flow of Shuanglonghai Waterfall larger, because there are more layers of travertine rocks, the waterfalls are more beautiful, and the most important thing is that there are fewer people and you can sit here for a long time. , Watching the waterfall quietly, listening to the sound of water, it was really comfortable. The Rhino Sea is similar to the Tiger Sea. The reed beach is very long, and it feels almost 2km long, but the sea like a jade belt flows quietly among the large tracts of reeds. I really want to lie down on the spot and have a beautiful sleep. The last stop is Zharu Temple, you can see if you go to worship or visit according to your personal beliefs. “Spring flowers in spring, flowing water in summer, colorful forest in autumn, and white snow in winter.” Although the scenery of Jiuzhaigou is beautiful all year round, it still takes some luck and opportunity to see the most beautiful scenery, and the scenery of Jiuzhaigou cannot be completely taken from photos and videos alone. It's really worth it to appreciate it.

Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area, you can queue up directly for the set tickets bought in Trip.com and brush your ID card. Many people will line up for the sightseeing car. First go to the long sea attractions on the left, sunshine and water fog, blue sky and white clouds, blue sea子, colored forests, visit the five-color pool on the way, and then take the car to the five-color sea scenic spot on the right. Then you play all the way to Nuorilang Falls, then continue to visit Shuzheng Falls and so on, and visit 4:30 to Mizoguchi. Needless to say, the beauty of Jiuzhaigou is a third time to play, but unfortunately this time it is a bit early, the red leaf level has not yet appeared, every time you see there will be surprises.

I came to Jiuzhai in mid-March, the whole tour route of Jiuzhai is Y-shaped, from the entrance by sightseeing bus 20 minutes to reach the Norilang transit station, then according to the day tour schedule first to Changhai or first to Wuhuahai. Personally, Wuhuahai is better looking. Other places may be the season is wrong, there are drop-offs, the whole tour time is more than 6 hours is enough. It is best to bring lunch by yourself, otherwise it will be more delayed to go to the restaurant near the transfer station at noon.

attractions.name: Bipeng Valley
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Li County, Bipeng Valley
attractions.address: No. 88, Zhuangfang Village, Putou Township, Li County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: You must be very well-prepared to wear warm clothing to visit Bipeng valley even during autumn time because it is very cold up the mountains. The latitude is high and visitors may want to prepare oxygen bottles too. I suggest to cater a full day to visit Bipeng valley. There are rest stops that sell food and drinks.

The scenery of Bipenggou is beautiful. Go in early autumn. Although it is cold but not the coldest time, the climate on the mountain is very comfortable. People with altitude sickness should prepare oxygen cylinders.

Bi Penggou Scenic Area is the core of Mialuo Scenic Area, located in the area of Soluogou, Putou Township, Li County, Aba Prefecture, Sichuan Province, where the natural environment protection is good, the ecological system is perfect, is one of the most famous red leaf viewing places in China. Autumn is the most beautiful season of Bi Penggou, red leaves, clear water, snowy mountains constitute a shocking blockbuster. But it is also the most tourist time. In fact, spring, summer, winter scenery is also beautiful and unique. Can take the Chengdu Tea Shop Station to Li County, then transfer to Bi Penggou, or visit Taoping Yaozhai again to Li County.

Bi Penggou is a large-scale original ecological tourism scenic spot which combines the original ecological landscape, mountaineering, polar exploration, skiing and ice skating, leisure and vacation. Bi Penggou is famous for its beautiful natural scenery, perfect natural ecological landscape and excellent ecological environment. In the scenic area, red leaves, azaleas, a variety of primitive forests, waterfalls flying hanging, glaciers strange. Bi Penggou is compared to the beautiful back of Siguniang Mountain. It is a colorful world, thick green trees, deep red leaves, green lake, blue sky, pure white snow, it is a colorful world, steep peaks, a glacier, temples on earth.

Go to this ditch must be the weather to see the snowy mountains, the color of the sky is different, the water will look more beautiful. I have been to Bi Penggou many times, so this time to see the cloud in Bi Penggou is also quite a taste.

attractions.name: Huanglong Scenic Area
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Songpan, Huanglong Scenic Area, Huanglong Scenic Area
attractions.address: near Pingsong Road,Songpan County,Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: Beautiful scenery, I would totally recommend to visit the whole Park by foot and avoid taking the cable car. It''s a waste of money. The track to the top is very nice and easy and not a lot of people take it.

Buy one way up cable car. The main attraction - huanglong temple is about an hour slow hike (includes photo taking). After that, its a 1 km walk round the huanglong temple (hill path). Walk down from huanglong temple to exit. I took 1.5 hours as it is dry season - dry river beds, ponds and no waterfalls.There is only chinese food up above. So buy your fast food burgers at the building near the bus stop going to the cable car station.

Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area, Huanglong Scenic Area can travel freely to Songpan Ancient City. Jiuzhaigou Goukou Passenger Transport Station has direct passenger cars to Huanglong Scenic Area. Most of the self-guided people go to the passenger station to buy tickets on the day they arrive at the Jiuzhaigou scenic spot or after visiting the scenic spot the next afternoon. It is mid-October, and the passenger terminal sells tickets until 19:00 in the evening. There are two buses to Huanglong Scenic Area at 7:30 and 7:40 every morning. The fare is 47 yuan. Arrive at Huanglong Scenic Area at about 10:30. Under normal circumstances, return to Jiuzhaigou Goukou at 15:30 in the afternoon. In case of special circumstances, traffic jams, etc., arriving at Huanglong Scenic Area late, the driver will delay the return time in the afternoon. Return the shuttle bus to Chuanzhu Temple Tourist Bus Station. Many tourists from Jiuzhaigou, after visiting Huanglong, get off at Chuanzhu Temple, leave the scenic spot and go to Songpan. Friends who take the return bus can buy the return ticket to Chuanzhu Temple for 25 yuan in Jiuzhaigou. Carry-on luggage can be put on the shuttle bus. The driver is very polite, which is very helpful. If some people live far away from the passenger station, if they live on the way of a bus, talk to the conductor when buying the ticket. The bus departing from Jiuzhaigou Goukou Passenger Transport Station in the morning can pick you up on the road. I originally told the passenger station that it was going to be halfway. After returning to the hotel, the little boss offered to take us to the station in the morning. I am really grateful to the Tibetan compatriots in Jiuzhaigou for their simplicity, kindness, and hospitality. Free travel is very convenient here. . . Before finally getting off the bus, the bus master told me that there are many buses going to Songpan County at Chuanzhusi Bus Terminal. The bus costs 3 yuan per person. Stop the car on the road. . Carpooling costs 10 yuan per person. We took a 3 yuan bus from Chuanzhu Temple to Songpan Bus Station. The journey is 17 kilometers. . I have talked a lot about it, just want to make the plan for free travellers who have never been here more accurate.

The scenery is so unique! We arrived at Huanglong on the way back from Jiuzhaigou. Although it was a bit cold in this season, it was warm when we climbed the mountain. Although we are from the Northeast, we often see the snowy mountains, but the snowy scenery of Huanglong made us admire... There are squirrels on the mountain 🐿️, The snow in the bonsai xianchi is about to melt, the sound of water running through the valley is beautiful...excellent...the scenery is good, the overall is awesome, cost-effective,

The wash hole in Huanglong scenic spot is spectacular. There is a clear hole under the Cahua Falls. The Cahua flow that falls down on the golden sand beach is formed. The longest Cahua wall in the world is a 10 meters high, 40 meters wide Cahua flow. Water from the levee over the bottom, the wall of the Cavalcade into a golden cascading waterfall.

attractions.name: Dagu Holy-glacier

reviews: A new attraction from China, Dagu Glacier Height 4860M above sea level is very beautiful and cold place.  The scenic is also beautiful.

Dagu Glacier, the cableway on it, purported to be the best cableway in the world, the cableway mountain top is 4,800 meters above sea level. On the way up the mountain, you will pass the Tibetan Village and the Monkey Group, which are beautiful and interesting attractions. The snow mountain is scenic and there are good scenery along the way. Also, having coffee at the top of the mountain and seeing the snowy mountains around it is very good.

The Dagu Glacier is the name of the Chinese Color Glacier Ice and Snow Paradise, and the famous writer Alai is known as the "recent distant". For thousands of years, the Dagu glacier, like a girl in a pavilion, was unknown until the 1990s, the nearest glacier to the city, the most beautiful glacier in the landscape. Take the sightseeing cableway from the welcoming lake to the high altitude glacier No. 1, the top is covered with snow year round. There are more than 200 glacier lakes between the glaciers, crystal clear and beautiful, well worth a visit.

Dagu Glacier Scenic Area is located in Heishui County, Aba Prefecture, Sichuan Province, and is a bright pearl inlaid in Aba Dajiuzhai International Tourist Area. Dagu Snow Mountain is snowy all year round, with great power, the peaks fall in a different way, silver rays under the sun, very spectacular. There are modern mountain glaciers, waterfalls, lakes, virgin forests, patches of azaleas and meadow. Scenic areas are rated as the most attractive new scenery, Sichuan best vacation destination, red leaves best viewing destination and so on.

Dagu Glacier, located in Heishui County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan Province, China. It is the lowest altitude, largest area, youngest glacier in the world and the nearest glacier in the city. It is the most beautiful glacier in the glacier area to date. Enter into the ancient, deeply into the continuous quiet, snowy mountains paved, as if whole across the vast ring, and billions of years ago time reunion, the time in the ear whispered the changes of the sea, so quietly listen, clean, quiet time, time and space. There are 2 routes from Chengdu to Kurosui, and the whole route is about 290km, and it is located in Kurosui Prefecture, hiromo Prefecture, Wenchuan, Jiangsu, Chengdu (Tatsugu glacial zone).

attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Xiaojin, Siguniang Mountain, Mount Siguniang (Skubla)

reviews: The main peak is more than 6000 meters above sea level and only 200 kilometers away from Chengdu. It can be said that it can be crossed to "Little Switzerland" and "Oriental Alps" in minutes. Taking advantage of the weekend to drive by car, inhale oxygen, eat pure yak meat, smash high goat skewers, outdoor hiking or camping by the mountain stream, it is not too cure. 🏔Attractions: Siguniang Mountain is divided into [Changping Valley] [Shuangqiao Valley] and [Haizi Valley]. Among them, Shuangqiaogou is recommended. Location: Xiaojin County and Siguniangshan Town are both good places to stay. You can navigate directly to it. 🕐Time: Two days and one night on weekends are recommended. Price: ☝ Peak season (from April 1 to November 30 each year) Shuangqiaogou 80 yuan/person Changpinggou 70 yuan/renhaizigou 60 yuan/person ✌ Low season (from December 1st to March 30th of the following year) Shuangqiaogou 50 yuan/person Changpinggou 50 yuan/Renhaizigou 40 yuan/person (sightseeing ticket: Shuangqiaogou 80 yuan/person Changpinggou 30 yuan/person) 🌟🌟How to play: 👍【Shuangqiaogou】Unified bus, 5 scenic spots throughout the journey, get off at one spot for sightseeing, and then get on the bus to the next one. It's already beautiful along the way, and every scenic spot is a good place to take a daze. 👍【Changpinggou】There is a large walking plank road, which is more suitable for hikers, and you can also ride horses. ⚠️Cautions⚠️1⃣It is not recommended to go in bad weather. Any mudslide in western Sichuan can trap you for a week‼ ️2⃣Be sure to bring thick clothes‼ ️3⃣Be sure to pay attention to the road conditions when traveling by car! Watch out for falling rocks‼ ️4⃣Friends with serious anti-reactions should be cautious‼ ️(In fact, it is not more than 3000 meters tall)————————About me: [Chongqing] born, [Australia] grown up, [Shanghai] household registration, [Foshan] settled, [Chengdu] working building Design 🐶. Welcome to follow the exchange!

Siguniang Mountain is very worth a visit. Beautiful. The air is fresh and the scenery is all the way. I went in November and saw red leaves, yellow leaves, and the ice hanging from the roadside trees. The snow is heavy but not close to the mountain.

Siguniang Mountain Scenic Area is the world natural heritage, national AAAA class tourist attraction, national scenic spot, national geological park, national nature reserve, Sichuan giant panda habitat world heritage, the ten national famous mountaineering. Siguniang Mountain Scenic Area is located in Siguniangshan Town, Xiaojin County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan Province. It consists of four continuous peaks, which are the main peak of Siguniang Mountain, the elevation is 6250 meters, and belongs to the Qiangshan Mountain of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. It is covered with snow and ice all year round, known as the "Oriental Alps".

Siguniang Mountain Erfeng Base Camp is about 4200 above sea level, frozen into 🐶 at night, tanned into 🐶 at noon, the base camp really has no signal, just came back, the teammates have gone to the top, I am responsible for the bottom, is actually frozen shivering

Siguniangshan Mountain is divided into three ditch: Changping ditch, Shuangqiao ditch, Haizi ditch~Because we want to walk purely, we choose Changping ditch, partners who don’t need to walk a lot can choose Shuangqiao ditch, Changping ditch~mu mule My friend and I go back and forth for 7 hours, 22 kilometers, the scenery is very beautiful, I love the scenery here, the big peak and the second peak enter from Haizigou, and the third peak enters from Changpinggou.

The theater is relatively large and the performances are very exciting, allowing visitors to appreciate the unique culture of the local Tibetans, and the artistic appeal is very strong.

reviews: Chengdu all travel bus directly, the transportation is convenient, here are mountains, snow peaks, forests, grasslands, lakes scattered among them, beautiful scenery, the size of the scenic area is large, visitors take a green bus one stop one stop to visit, not very tired.

The scenery is very beautiful, the snowy mountains are shining in the sunshine, each tree in the sea buckthorn forest has its own unique beauty, the whole sightseeing car is not tired, it is very suitable for the whole family to travel together, look forward to going again next time.

Shuangqiaogou got its name from two wooden bridges in the ditch. The ditch is dominated by snow peaks, pastures, grasslands, forests, etc. It is the most beautiful ditch in Siguniang Mountain. Walking in the ditch, you can experience the real pastoral scenery. The main scenic spots are Yinyang Valley, Hunter Peak, Sun and Moon Mirror and Five-color Mountain. The mountains in Shuangqiaogou are steep and tortuous, with lush forests. There are common birch forests and cypress forests in low mountain areas, spruces, firs, redwoods in high mountains, and seabuckthorn, shrubs, and larch. Every spring and autumn, the ditch is colorful and magnificent, and there are sightseeing cars that go straight to the end of the ditch, so you can easily watch the wonders in the ditch.

attractions.name: Hohensalzburg Fortress
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Austria, Salzburg, Salzburg, Hohensalzburg Fortress
reviews: It is a good place to visit and photgraphic. Lot of tourist but due to Covid-19 pandemic not so many people around. Some said they are nice to see the sunset.

HuoHeng salzburg fort is located in salzburg old monks in the mountains, is the landmark building of the city. The white castle stronghold has a long history, it was founded in 1077, the former archbishop gradually expand and become, it is also one of Europe''s largest medieval castle. Castle with museums, cafes, and is also a good place for overlooking the whole landscape. To visit the fort, there are two ways you can take opened in 1892, the small gear train up the hill, just 1 minute can come to the top of the hill, the little train every interval of 10 minutes.

Take the Viking River Cruise on the Danube to Salzburg, Austria’s second largest city. This is the hometown of the famous musician Mozart, here is the world's top music academy, and it is also a place of pilgrimage for musicians from all over the world. This is a very beautiful city. They are proud of Mozart. Many foods on the kitchen windows have Mozart's head and name. There is a statue of Mozart on the square, old-fashioned carriages, street performers... everywhere.
Go up to the top of Horn Salzburg Fortress and have a unobstructed view of Salzburg.

Austria, the Salzburg Castle Fortress built on the hill is a landmark building in the city of Salzburg, and it is also one of the existing fortresses in Central Europe. The Salzburg Fortress has an electronic guided tour in Chinese, but there are fewer rooms to visit. The first floor is a model of the castle in different historical periods. It will explain the relationship between the construction of the castle and the bishops. The rest will be explained according to different rooms. The most classic are the observation deck on the top floor and the observation deck by the city wall, which overlook the city of Salzburg, and the shooting angle is excellent. In addition, there are several small museum explanations, scattered in different areas. There is a puppet museum which is small but very interesting.

attractions.name: Mirabell Palace and Gardens
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Austria, Salzburg, Salzburg, Mirabell Palace and Gardens
reviews: Mirabell Palace and Mirabell Gardens are one of the most important sights of Salzburg. The complex is under monument protection and founded back then on year 1730's.

Mirabel palace and the garden was founded in 1606, is located in salzburg Seltzer river, was the archbishop wolff Dietrich built for their lover''s salome, after Dietrich died by the successors renamed mirabel palace. Now it has become the salzburg''s town hall. Mira garden Bella is the most popular with tourists taking pictures. This offer the Roman sculpture, fountain, garden, a maze of baroque garden, was a famous film "the sound of music", the heroine maria took the children sing "Do - Re - Mi" place.

What a charming place, the archbishop's garden for his lover. When can anyone build a garden for me? The yard is not big, but the flowers are colorful and beautiful, and you can see the mountains. In summer there are so many people, crowded to tourists from all over the world. A bit crowded but not to interfere with taking pictures

The Mirabel Palace in Salzburg, founded in 1606, was built by the archbishop of the time for his lover and renamed the Mirabel Palace. Now it is the town hall and exhibition hall in Salzburg. The Mirabel Garden is the most popular photo spot for visitors. This baroque garden, with Roman sculptures, fountains, gardens, mazes, was the place where the heroine Maria sang Do-Re-Mi with her children in the famous film Sound of Music. Mirabel Garden is actually a small garden, in the middle of a large fountain, surrounded by many Greek mythical figures statues.
With the opening of the Sound of Movie Music, the wonderful scenery and music of Salzburg and Austria are famous, and the Mirabel Palace is famous.

attractions.name: Mozart's Birthplace
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Austria, Salzburg, Salzburg, Mozart's Birthplace
reviews: W. A. Mozart was born in 1756 in the "Hagenauer Haus" at No. 9 Getreidegasse in Salzburg. Today, Mozart's Birthplace is one of the most visited museums in Austria. Sadly they are temporarily closed.

Mozart''s birthplace (Mozarts Geburtshaus) is located in the city of salzburg, Austria food hutong, 9 is a beige six floors of buildings, on January 27, 1756, a genius musician Mozart was born here. Mozart''s father was a violinist, a from 1747 to 1773, they live on the third floor of this building. Mozart was born in position is the most buildings that grabs an eye on food alley, yellow walls, with the red and white flag in Austria.

Located at the border between Austria and Germany, Salzburg is the capital, not just the Mozart capital and the host city of the Art Festival. Among the city's most important hot spots, you can experience not only the city's splendid history, but also countless fascinating and amazing things. Salzburg Castle, Mozart Museum, Grain Street or Heilbrun Palace are Salzburg's most popular attractions. 10 Hot Spot Rankings let you know clearly about this UNESCO World Heritage City ...
A place of birth for musical genius, the city of Salzburg
The place where the music prodigy is born is full of imagination.

attractions.name: Salzburg Cathedral
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Austria, Salzburg, Salzburg, Salzburg Cathedral
reviews: Salzburg Cathedral was rebuild on 1181 according to the history. It is the seventeenth-century Baroque cathedral of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Salzburg in the city of Salzburg, Austria, dedicated to Saint Rupert and Saint Vergilius.

Now cathedral still maintained at the time of appearance, internal structure is not damaged, can say it is more preserved ruins. Imposing facade and the huge circular roof embodies the characteristic of the early baroque style majestic Alps side. Since the date of its completion, it is all closely linked with the Vatican princes. From the church was burned in the fire, to be rebuilt and expanded, all witnessed in the process of this series of salzburg hierarch of supreme power and independence.

Coming to Mozart's hometown, in the Bishop's Square of Salzburg Cathedral, there is a modernist sculpture. It is said that the name "The Man Standing on the Ball has never come down" is the work of a German artist.
The place to visit is definitely a must, and the atmosphere in the church is solemn and solemn, the dome frescoes are beautiful and the organ is exceptional
The famous Cathedral in Salzburg, good!

attractions.name: Hellbrunn Castle

reviews: Hellbrunn Palace was built since 17th century. It is also known in German "Schloss Hellbrunn" which an early Baroque villa of palatial size, near Morzg.

Palace is located in the western suburbs of salzburg, and haier is marcus · west mention, bishop built between 1612 and 1615 Summer Palace, the grand hall, charming and unique garden fountains make haier palace in the beginning a celebration, celebrations, performances and cultural activities. Here for the zoo and is famous for its fountains and later zoo animals were kept, and haier bren palace is full of tong qu and imagination of the fountain attracts numerous people still come. Haier boulogne palace and therefore also known as the bright spring palace, now it has become attractive conference, academic, communication and social activities, is also the local people like to go for a walk, summer, the children''s favorite place to paddle.

The gardens are huge and beautiful, full of sculptures and fountains, and a great view of the Alps, but the most fascinating and highlight is the large and small fountains inside the garden, which are hidden in mystery and constantly surprises...
It's not the first time I've been here. Every time I have a different feeling.

Heilbrunn Palace is also known as the Water Palace, and it can be seen from the name that it is unavoidable to have close contact with water. The owner who built this palace prefers pranks. There are a lot of organs set up in the gardens and palaces, which are hard to guard against. A small amount of wet body may be inevitable. Because the palace was built very early, these fountains are not driven by electricity, but Realized by water pressure. The palace is located in the southern suburbs of Salzburg, about 20 minutes by bus. In addition to the playing area, there are palaces and gardens to visit.

attractions.name: Mozart Residence
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Austria, Salzburg, Salzburg, Mozart Residence
reviews: Mozart Residence history is which from 1773 to 1787, the Mozarts lived at the so-called "Dance Master's House", standing on today's Makartplatz.The spacious eight-room apartment on the first floor is now home to a museum. Open from 10am to 0330pm.
And this is the home of Mozart, Mozart''s birthplace is not a place where the across the river, compared to the birthplace, the things on display here more rich life breath

Here is a famous music master Mozart had lived, 1773-1780, he had a short but happy time here. As the mother died in 1781, then start a new life away from salzburg to Vienna, Mozart and created countless violin. The house damaged in the 1944 war, after repair formally opened to the public as a museum in 1996, here can see Mozart had creative monuments such as the manuscript.
The home of a celebrity is no different from the home of a normal person, but admirers hope to reinterpret a person through centuries of history in a vivid scene, Mozart's sandwich is delicious.
Magic flute, Figaro's wedding, Turkish March, Don Jupiter, Jupiter Symphony...
