reviews: This is a very great waterpark. My friends and I had a great time. Some of the rides have a weight limit so pay attention to that. We had to wait for maybe an Hour to get on one ride so be prepared to spend an entire day. I thought that the Price was reasonable.
great place for adults abd kids! recommended length of stay would be 3-4 hours. price is fairly cheap 300 RMB per adult

It is great for kids - they love the rides although be prepared to pay full price for children above 1.22m. It is definitely for the wealthy - i did expect it to be cheaper than it was - however, no different to any european waterpark entrance. You are not able to take in own food or drink - queues were quick and not crowded. Plenty of entertainment depending on what you like!

The pass includes one ticket and unlimited tickets for 338 ordinary tickets. The guests of Atlantis are free~ It takes two days to play all the items. The four projects on the Sea God Tower [shark crossing] enter the shark pool tunnel from the relatively smooth slide. The following preheats [octopus races] on a yoga mat, running all the way down the tower from the tube to the bottom of the Atlantis signboard event, the tower leaps 24 meters above the water and goes through the bottom glass tube of all sharks. Another sign, I think is the highest risk index in the whole park, throw you in a small box, inadvertently, the floor of the small box was suddenly pulled away, you fell! Four projects on the princess tower [horseman] rushed down the tower, water splashed on the face, there is a feeling that the boat will fly uphill [serial trumpet] bend thief is very anxious, a super bend feeling that the boat will fly out [splash trumpet] the speed is super fast down, you can open your eyes, The visual experience was amazing [Whirlwind Horn] slides into a Horn from the high platform, the boat flies and then falls free [Rage Cycling] has a track to take the two-person boat to a high place, then the words can not be rushed, the water plops on the face, Before the mood has not come down to the end of the test [ let go of a fight] is the most exciting! Everyone has fun ~ myopic friends must prepare contact lenses. The staff was very safety conscious, and a small metal logo on my swimsuit was reminded by the staff that it was cut off with the assistance of the staff for the safety of other tourists to tourists and myself. Regarding eating, in addition to eating in the hotel, I went to the nearby seafood store (Lin Jie Xiang Seafood Store), but I really can't find any other place. Down the road, her family is the most, there is a free shuttle service, but I have to call in advance to make an appointment. The youth water world that likes to play the project is really a must-play in Sanya.

Atlantis Water World is really awesome! I really love the octopus race and shark crossing not fast at all, suitable for children and old people to play, but all must play before listening to the lifeguard explanation, keep good posture! Big horn and big wave board do not take leather, two small trumpets need to take leather...This I have played, hahaha...This kind of swinging things I really can't, I too dish! The point is coming, the roller coaster is simply awesome, fortunately bought a fast ticket, you can buy it at the door, you can also buy it when you find the park staff, this project is a lot of people queuing, I have played with friends twice, it is really cool! Recommend everyone to play!

attractions.name: West Island
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hainan, Sanya, West Island
attractions.address: Xiaoyagang West Island Marine Cultural Tourism Zone, Tianya District, Sanya
reviews: We wanted to spend at least one of the days during our vacation swimming in a clear sea. So we took a speed boat from the Xidao Wharf, which was 95 RMB for a round-trip, and spent the whole day there. This place was really beautiful, water was turquoise and so clear, we could see mackerel snooping around the pier. I would say it was the cleanest beach around Sanya, with sand basically of sea-ground corals and shells. It was gloomy and rainy on the opposite shore when we enjoyed sun baths on the West island beaches. After that we took a ride (35 RMB for a round-trip) along the seaside with a destination point at the little adjacent island. The whole place basically is more than just a touristic spot, it has its own history. During the WWII it was a military base of Chinese, then Japanese troops, so you would find catacombs and fortifications during your journey around the island. Most of them are closed nowadays, but we found an opened one right under the hill with a golden bull on the top I'd highly recommend this place if you got tired of the overcrowded beaches in Sanya. It's really worth visiting
The water is turquoise, fine sand, water sports. Everything is there to have a good time.
was good island

This attraction, I said two o'clock. First, 🌴🌴🌴 Not buying the project on Wuzhizhou, it's better to go directly to West Island, the scenery is the same, the facilities are different, Wuzhizhou is a private business, the commercial routine is very deep, deliberately pressure the customer to cause the queue, let you buy the big V to skip the queue, in fact, the reason for the queue is not many people, But there is only one ticket gate, 😎 is not very funny! The fools are fooled, the smart people don't eat your set (there are detailed no-line guides below)! Compared with West Island, more than 2,000 original residents just let you know the local customs and habits, and you can rent a small motorcycle to play around the island! Second 🌴🌴🌴 I said that the queue-free skills in Wuzhizhou are more than 30 kilometers from the city, which is not far, but the traffic is really a problem. If you report a day trip, you will waste 4 hours. Because the tour group has tasks to let you buy the island project, they will spend a lot of time explaining. And all the group departure times are the same, resulting in too many people landing at the same time, and the queue is serious. At this time, I suggest that everyone get up at 6 o'clock, take the earliest bus to Haitang Bay, such as No. 2 Road, and then take a taxi to the dock. The total cost is less than 20 yuan. The most important thing is that you arrive at the dock before 8 o'clock. Buying the ticket online the day before, picking up the ticket directly, landing on the island, guarantee not to queue, it is particularly cool! Even if you don't play, if you want to go to the island early, you will not have to queue at noon! If you want to play with projects, you can also play more (if you report a tour group, it must not be finished, because it takes a whole day to walk down the island to take a photo) West Island, you can get by bus, or rent a motorcycle in the city. It is also the earliest arrival. It is casual to play, unlike Wuzhizhou, which is not so particular!

It's best to make sure you're expecting something from where you go. We take a little girl to the island and the children are still small to see the scenery on the island. Walking in the sand, not diving, not playing anything. The pure experience of the environment and people. The West Island has totally met our expectations. In addition to getting off the boat, we met the tour group. It took a long time to queue up and live in Sanya. Take a car from the city to the West Island Scenic Area. There are more than 40 Wuzhizhou in both directions of Yalong Bay. When you take a boat for 20 minutes and return to 3 o'clock in the afternoon, there will be more people waiting in line to spend time playing. It's better to watch the scenery, play the sand and step on the water. You can eat 88. You can also go to the fishing village to eat stalls.

attractions.name: Yalong Bay
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hainan, Sanya, Yalong Bay
attractions.address: Yalong Bay National Tourism Resort, Sanya City
reviews: definitely check out the yacht rentals. it's super affordable and a great way to spend the afternoon with friends.
Stunning sandy beach with beautiful turquoise sea. great spot for swimming and sunbathing.

Yalong bay is a small bay with nice hotels like Hilton, Sheraton, Mariott etc. There are a few shopping malls with restaurants and also an outlet center with branded clothing. The beach is clean and the sea water is beautiful. There is also a romance park with a panoramic view of Sanya in the bay.

Beautiful, serene and peaceful! White sands and blue seas. It is a great place to grab a coconut or try some grilled seafood. Water activities like jet skiis, parasailing, and jet packs are common here too.

The beach is really accessible, and so beautiful. The sand is white and mostly clean, and the sea goes out flat for a long way so you can easily go and swim. There are some little shops and fruit sellers on the beach. Highly recommend.

attractions.name: Hong Kong Disneyland
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Hong Kong Disneyland
attractions.address: Hong Kong Disneyland Resort, Lantau, Hong Kong
reviews: Hong Kong Disneyland is a theme park located on reclaimed land in Penny's Bay, Lantau Island. Officially opened open on 2019.It is located inside the Hong Kong Disneyland Resort and it is owned and managed by Hong Kong International Theme Parks. It is the largest theme park in Hong Kong, followed by Ocean Park Hong Kong.
going into disney is like really going into a magical world.
awesome . walk straight to gate don’t have to queue to get ticket exchange .
the best part of this Disneyland is for me the act that take a whole of effort to make
I liked this park more than Ocean Park because I am more into fairy tales.

attractions.name: Ocean Park Hong Kong
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Ocean Park Hong Kong
attractions.open_status: Open from 10:00am to 6:00pm on weekdays, and 10:00am to 7:00pm on weekends and public holidays
attractions.address: Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong Island, Wong Chuk Hang, South Lang Shan, Hong Kong Ocean Park
reviews: Ocean Park Hong Kong, commonly known as Ocean Park, is a marine mammal park, oceanarium, animal theme park and amusement park situated in Wong Chuk Hang and Nam Long Shan in the Southern District of Hong Kong. This place just re-open after 2 month construction.It is the second largest theme park in Hong Kong, after Hong Kong Disneyland.kAnd also, the largest theme park in Hong Kong by area. It is also the second oldest theme park in Hong Kong, after the now-defunct Lai Chi Kok Amusement Park which closed on 31 March 1997, four months before the 1997 handover.

I visited ocean park in November ... when the weather is good, it is such a great experience to ride in the cable car!!! unforgettable trip, and happy to visit the shops too! I got a T-shirt at 30%! off (devil fish pattern for ladies) and a silicon lunch box. I wish to visit again next year on my birthday!!( with free entrance ticket)
love the place and view really forward to see it
It was great experience on this place. I loved this place and all playing equipment also rides all.

Amazing Experience,  and much having fun with kids, for first time they  visit ocean park hongkong, and tried all play ground and games, and specially the transportation, so easy now by MTR.. thank you

attractions.name: Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Guangdong, Zhuhai, Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge
attractions.address: Tangqi Road, Xiangzhou District, Zhuhai City
reviews: Hong Kong–Zhuhai–Macau Bridge is a 55-kilometre bridge–tunnel system consisting of a series of three cable-stayed bridges, an undersea tunnel, and four artificial islands.It is both the longest sea crossing and the longest open-sea fixed link in the world.
such an amazing buildinge!China forever!

The feeling of the Hong Kong and Zhuhai Bridge is also quite characteristic from the sky. A bridge at the Pearl River Estuary is a tunnel in the middle. It looks like a dragon in the outline. The buildings on the Macau and Zhuhai ports are stacked with the overall lighting near the airport on the Hong Kong side. different .

The father's generation had special feelings for the grand construction of the country. Since the bridge was completed and opened to traffic, I have always wanted to see the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge, and took my parents there when I had time. I found a homestay with a view of the bridge. The surrounding environment is very good. The Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge is really magnificent and it is worth seeing! You can also go to Hong Kong and Macau through the highway port, which is very convenient.
Nice view, fun and fun,

attractions.name: Ngong Ping 360
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Ngong Ping 360
attractions.open_status: Opening hours: 10:00-18:00 (Monday-Friday), 9:00-18:30 (Saturday, Sunday and public holidays). Ticket collection time: 10:00-15:00 (Monday-Friday), 9:00-15:00 (Saturday, Sunday and public holidays).
attractions.address: 11 Tat Tat Road, Tung Chung, Lantau, Hong Kong
reviews: Ngong Ping 360 is a highland cable car in the western part of Lantau Island, Hong Kong. It hosts Po Lin Monastery and Tian Tan Buddha amidst the hills which is about 34 m tall.There are several hills nearby which are also an attraction to tourists.
Great day at Disney!! Tickets were so much cheaper booking via trip and hassle free when we  got to the gate. Bonus, no waiting in the line for tickets.
The Cable care ride was nice and smooth. Sufficient eating places. Good way to spend the day. Very suitable for familes. All the facilies are clean

Being an acrophobic, I thought riding the cable car would be a bad idea, but it turned out to be so amazing and fun. We chose the standard cable instead. It took for how many minutes before we got to the Ngong Ping Village. I super enjoyed the view and the scenery from up there. Ngong Ping village is another story to tell. Visiting this place enabled us to know Hong Kong more as it portrays the other side of the country.

Ngong Ping cable car is worth the purchase. I had bought a fast pass off get your guide for £15, this was for a glass bottom car. There was 6 of us in a car, it was incredible. You have 360 degree views across the waters and can listen to the free audio message which lasts the duration of crossing the water (around 20mins). You get informed of things around you and below you, it’s fascinating!Only downside was the queue which was just over an hour queue for a fast pass ticket.

attractions.name: Victoria Peak
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Victoria Peak
attractions.open_status: The Peak Tram Lower Terminus: Monday-Sunday 7:00-24:00; The Peak Tower: Monday-Friday 10:00-23:00, Saturday-Sunday 8:00-23:00
attractions.address: 33 Garden Road, Central, Hong Kong Island
reviews: found that when arrived before noon, the blue sky & clouds views are at their best! took peak tram this time... taking no 15 bus is equally good!!

Victoria Peak is a hill on the western half of Hong Kong Island. It is also known as Mount Austin, and locally as The Peak.With an elevation of 552 m, it is the highest hill on Hong Kong island, ranked 31 in terms of elevation in Hong Kong with elevation at 552m.
One of the best spots to see Hong Kong Island And Victoria Harbour from above. Come here before night time to see the difference of the view between day and night.

It was an amazing trip to the Victoria Peak.  My friend and I decided to hike up to the Peak as we were told its quite an exercise to walk up.  We took the 12A bus to MacDonnell Road in Mid-Levels, then began walking up to Garden Road and slowly made our way up to Robinson Road. After passing Lady's Recreational Club, we continued up to Tregunter Path which is where the started trail is located. The overall hike was 1.5 hours and it was quite difficult to walk because it was all steep slopes, however, the view was completely worth it. You should aim to go before sunset and watch sunset up on the Peak. We went at night but the skyline was so beautiful with all the lights lit up.
Great view of Hong Kong 360Degrees A Must place for taking amazing pictures and a Adventurous ride to the peak by peak tram 10/10

attractions.name: Sky100 Observation Deck
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Sky100 Observation Deck
attractions.address: 100/F, International Commerce Centre, 1 Austin Road West, Kowloon, Hong Kong. (MTR Kowloon Station Exit C)
reviews: Sky100 is a 360-degree indoor observation deck on the 100th floor of the International Commerce Centre, in West Kowloon, Hong Kong near Kowloon station.The deck offers views of Hong Kong Island, Victoria Harbour, the Kowloon Peninsula and Tai Mo Shan in the background. Ticket price will at 53MYR or around $ 15USD per person.

I had a few hours left in Hong Kong and thanks to trip.com I found Sky100. I booked my tickets trough the app and experience a smooth entrance. The location is Beautiful, the experience in the lift with the awesome graphics inside are worth the experience. When I was at the top I enjoyed the views of the city and it's port. After walking around I enjoyed a cup of hot chocolate and a cookie. What a time to be alive.
you must have this , it's easy scan your code and go the code is valid 6 month from the day of issue i use it 3th day
Beautiful 360 view of Hong kong. When i visited the observation deck it wasnt crowded which gave me an opportunity to capture great pictures. I absolutely recommend this place.
good to visot

attractions.name: The Peak Tram
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, The Peak Tram
attractions.address: Peak Tram Station, Garden Road, Central, Hong Kong
reviews: The Peak Tram is a funicular railway in Hong Kong, which carries both tourists and residents to the upper levels of Hong Kong Island.Running from Garden Road Admiralty to Victoria Peak via the Mid-Levels, it provides the most direct route and offers good views over the harbour and skyscrapers of Hong Kong. Operated since May 1888, it was the first funicular railway in Asia. Ticket price around $ 32HKD.
The Peak Hong Kong, one of the best view at night
A great choice for a quick and easy access to the top of the mountain with landmarks, history and modern combination

The Peak Tram is a very unique tourist experience on Hong Kong Island. After boarding from the mountainous area of Hong Kong Island, it goes straight to the Peak Plaza, which is 396 meters in length. It is 1,300 feet in length and a short drive of more than ten minutes. It is an indispensable magical experience for visiting Hong Kong.

You can use the Octopus cable car system to gradually rise from the foot of the mountain in Central to the top of Victoria Peak. A red mountain bike with a steep slope can see the side of Hong Kong Island in the process.

attractions.name: Lantau Island
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Lantau Island
attractions.open_status: Open all day. Ngong Ping Cable Car is open from 10:00 to 18:00 on weekdays and from 9:00 to 18:30 on weekends and public holidays. It is closed on maintenance and repair days.
attractions.address: Hong Kong Outlying Islands, Lantau Island
reviews: So many great things to do on Lantau.  Lots of fantastic hiking trails, temples, the cable car ride to the Buddha plus villages with wonderful seafood and sunsets.

Lantau Island, the largest of Hong Kong's islands, lies at the mouth of the Pearl River.Its mountainous interior includes 934m-high Lantau Peak, known for its sunrises, and the area can be traversed by hikers on the 70km Lantau Trail from Mui Wo (Silver Mine Bay). Po Lin Monastery is the site of the bronze Tian Tan Buddha, a 34m-tall statue on a hilltop reached by a long stairway.

The Big Buddha is massive and stunning to view especially after climbing sets of stairs to reach the top. There is even a vegetarian restaurant nearby. The Ngong Ping 360 never ceases to amaze me. The view of when you're so up high is an amazing experience.
Cool amd very fascinating view on the top of the mountain❤

I've been here 12 months ago with my employers family on fix season and  we really enjoy the rides , wild animals show, costume show or theater show, playing and most of all i enjoyed most the color full big aquarium sight seeing . The place is very wide and 1 day isn't enough to go all facilities .

attractions.name: Noah's Ark
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Noah's Ark
attractions.address: 33 Perkin Road, Ma Wan, New Territories, Hong Kong
reviews: The epidemic in Hong Kong has been suspended, and Noah's Ark has reopened. Take the ferry at Central Pier 2 to Ma Wan Island. After disembarking, there are signs all the way. It is easy to find Noah's Ark. You can walk for about 20 minutes. This is a theme park where many parents will bring their children to play. It is said that it is the only full-scale reproduction of Noah's Ark in the world. Anyway, I saw a big wooden boat parked there from afar. There are multimedia exhibition halls, beautiful gardens, and life education halls, and some expansion games are also carried out.

I just wanted to go to Noah's Ark and saw that Ctrip showed that there was a special price of 1 yuan for the live broadcast at 17:30 on October 28, so I delayed the play time and waited for this great moment to come. It's finally time, "not on sale". 17:34, still "unopened for sale." After trying many times, the price of 1 yuan disappeared completely. Before going to bed, buy the tickets at the normal price. The next morning, it turned out that there was one ticket left for 1 yuan. depressed. Take the QR code given by Ctrip and enter the park soon. The park is much more fun than expected.
Overall great, nice view, fun, good value for money,
Fun and fun,

There are still some experiential games in it. When I was living in Mawan, I took my daughter to visit twice. It took about two or three hours to play, and it took an hour to get it done. Know Noah, know the Ark.

attractions.name: Victoria Harbour
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Hong Kong, Victoria Harbour
attractions.address: Bay between Hong Kong Kowloon Peninsula and Hong Kong Island
reviews: Victoria Harbour is a natural landform harbour separating Hong Kong Island in the south from the Kowloon Peninsula to the north.The harbour's deep, sheltered waters and strategic location on the South China Sea were instrumental in Hong Kong's establishment as a British colony and its subsequent development as a trading centre.
A very nice place to stay. Romantic ambiance at night and a very popular attraction or spot in Hong Kong. A must see in person place.

The great thing about the harbour is that it is magnificent for adults and kids alike. Kids can ride their scooters or scate as well as enjoy some great comic book characters while their carers take in the views and enjoy the serenity amid the buzz of the city
Amazing view and a good place to stroll along with some beautiful views on a clear day.
The hotel not only is clean, but also convenient. There are a lot of shopping mall nearby.

attractions.name: Zhouzhuang
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangsu, Suzhou, Kunshan, Zhouzhuang, Zhouzhuang
attractions.address: No.43, Quanfu Road, Zhouzhuang Town, Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province
reviews: What an experience....absolutely beautifull,good food,good vibes.
Lovely little town in Suzhou. Enjoyed the calmness of the ancient town and the friendliness of the people. Food is not cheap here, though.

The best place in China! Seriously, you just get lost there in world of wonder and awe. But, visit the resaurants outside of the ancient town scenenic hub - much cheaper and delicious. Everyday you can also watch an opera performance at the old theatre. I have been to Zhouzhuang 4 times. Can't wait to go again!
Zhouzhuang is one of the most famous tourist attraction in China! It's a must place to travel here!
Highly recommended place to visit in Suzhou, Its Absolutely Beautiful and Pleasant , You can also take a bot ride in the backwaters , Pretty AmazinG Place

attractions.name: Shuangqiao
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangsu, Suzhou, Kunshan, Zhouzhuang, Shuangqiao
attractions.address: Zhouzhuang Ancient Town Scenic Spot, 121 Quanfu Road, Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province
reviews: The place is absolutely amazing and worth the visit.

Zhouzhuang double bridge refers to the two bridges of Shide and Yong'an, which are located in the center of Zhouzhuang, built in the Ming Dynasty, and are connected by two bridges, which look very like the keys of ancient times, also known as the key bridge. It is famous for appearing in the painting "Memory of Hometown" by the travel American painter Chen Yifei.
No disappointment, worth the trip, recommend a homestay hotel: smoked rain people, steamed white fish must taste.

Shuangqiao is not actually two bridges, but a reflection of one bridge in the water, which looks like two bridges. Shuangqiao is also called the key bridge because when reflected in the water, it looks like a circle, more like a key used in ancient times, so it got a pen name. This bridge has actually attracted many famous Chinese painters and photographers to paint and take pictures here. Every year there are many artists who come here to take pictures. It can be said to be quite famous, and Shuangqiao really lives up to the expectations of the people. Simple and elegant

Very good value for money, Trip.com is also very convenient, next time I will choose Trip.com, the scenery is very good at night, it is recommended to go at night, it is a good choice to go with my family, and I will go next time, life is short and timely!

attractions.name: Mystery of Life Museum
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangsu, Suzhou, Kunshan, Zhouzhuang, Mystery of Life Museum
attractions.address: No. 82, Daqiao Road, Zhouzhuang Town, Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province
reviews: Great place to have a long knowledge and it was great to hear the explanations and it was ok

The exhibition hall is divided into three floors, covering 7,500 square meters, and has thousands of exhibits. The first floor is the "Sea of Soul" exhibition hall, the second floor is the "Spindle Kingdom" exhibition hall, and the third floor is the "Human World" exhibition hall.

Grab the tail of the holiday for a walk, a good museum, the main exhibits are real, including the human body, follow these elves' footsteps, we together through the evolution of vertebrates, experience the magic and the magnificent evolution of life.

After entering the venue, there will be staff to distribute a bone-shaped guide, input the exhibit code to understand each exhibit's own story, is suitable for children over the middle class to increase knowledge.
It’s a good place to take children to study

attractions.name: Carton King Theme Creative Park
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangsu, Suzhou, Kunshan, Zhouzhuang, Carton King Theme Creative Park
attractions.address: No. 19, Quanfu Road, Zhouzhuang Town, Kunshan City, Jiangsu Province
reviews: Just 100 meters ahead of Zhouzhuang entrance, which is full of the world of cartons, carton-made animals, sofas and small trains, there are many parent-child interaction areas, and the cat house, very interesting, suitable for bringing children to play.

The cardboard box king is not far from the entrance of Zhouzhuang gate, all made of cardboard box, very environmentally friendly. There are boys like cars, swords and shields, the price is not expensive! After all, it is about creativity.
A very interesting attraction, the contents are all made of cardboard, which is more interesting, but the price is not cheap.

One sentence that attracted me the most when I came to Zhouzhuang [There is a kind of life called Zhouzhuang] The Latte Stone Inn is in the scenic spot, together with the Carton Wang Wenchuang Park. It is a dazzling array of paper art and cultural and creative works from Taiwan. It is worth taking the children to experience the creations brought by life. Ye Zhouzhuang is also a visual feast for people to linger...

[Location] A short walk from the entrance of Zhouzhuang is the Carton King Creative Park. The location is very good and suitable for families with children. [Environment] The entire park is composed of the Carton King Inn Carton King Creative Restaurant and the activity area outdoor play area. It is simply a condensed children's kingdom. Stay here all day without getting bored. There is a small train made of paper, which shuttles through the park every day, and there is also a large activity room where you can do handicrafts and a library where children can spend a good afternoon. Various cartoon characters made of paper are vivid and vivid. There is also a large mushroom slide between the restaurant and the inn. The long spiral slide attracts many children and big friends. When night falls, the lights are on, and here is another scene.

attractions.name: Tongli Ancient Town
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Jiangsu, Suzhou, Tongli, Tongli Ancient Town
attractions.address: Tongli Ancient Town, Wujiang District, Suzhou City
reviews: Very intersting and unique scenic spot with great interconnected roadways and river running through the town.

tongli is a very cute water town. we really enjoyed going to the gardens, pagados, and shops. the bridges are beautiful, and there are many great photo opportunities here. I recommend a day trip if you are in Suzhou.
Beautiful and lively night and street life with great scenery and lights.
Very good place to relax and release the stress. I liked it very much. I will visit it again.

Like a Chinese Venice, this beautiful town enables one to slow down and enjoy a pace of life vastly different to the urban cities around. Cars are not allowed in the town, and note that the town tocket is a once off entry so unless you arrange with accomodation to have multiple entries don’t leave if you hope to return! Recommend wearing good walking shoes as the cobblestones are uneven and a day walking around is tiring. That said, it’s highly worth the walk. Children under 1.4m free. Our favourite site within the town was the Tuisi Garden, but all the little shops of knick knacks were fun to browse - albeit some full of kitsch plastic toys that distract the kids. The boat ride was fun and our boat driver sang us some songs for a small fee. The three bridges that couples in times past cross when they marry was wistful, and the museum of wedding artefacts a fascinating window into earlier times. Overall could have spent quite a few days more here resting and lingering.

Easy to get lost wandering around the narrow walkways. So many shops and tons of food to choose from. Good for a day trip from Shanghai or a quick weekend getaway.
Low-key place that has great food and beautiful places.
Okay cool with that one day and night to you tomorrow morning at least one more thing for me know when you're ready to leave early.

We can call this place XiTang , she also have nickle name which is DouFu . you can get this kind of food everywhere if you want . it is really a good plan for your lover . it is very convenience for you all to find a place for enjoy your life .

reviews: a nice ancient town area on waterways and lake . there is a village area and a temple area . there is a large pagoda on the lake . it is not too crowded during the afternoon period . a bit difficult to get to unless you have a car or taxi. but it is worth the visit.

Traffic Raiders: From Shanghai, finally take Line 11 to get off at Huaqiao, the official said is to take Kunshan Leyou Road 7. However, I was picked up by the hotel, 35 yuan a person. The whole journey took three hours to recommend: that is the legendary ancient lotus pond. The weather is good, the scenery is good, the photographing technology is slag and it can be pleasing to the eye. The tips: Jinxi Ancient Town is really not many people, and it is very comfortable to find the flow of people. The small population is the small area of Xinfu Ancient Town, walking and resting all the way, and walking for three or four hours. The local products are oysters, sock bottom oysters, shrimp dry and fish dry, all the way. I feel that the price is also OK. The oyster is small 35 yuan a bag, the sock bottom oyster 5 yuan a bag, shrimp dry 80 yuan a catty, all OK. I found the fresh meat dumplings inside the ancient town for 3 yuan, but can't eat it. Recommended Characteristics: In the ancient lotus pond there will find a temple, called lotus pond. Eat the inside of the vegetarian noodles, double mushroom winter porridge, 20 bowls, taste is OK.

Seeing Zhouzhuang came to Jinxi again, different surprise, encountered the heart of the long bridge ten eyes (before only know the long bridge do not know Jinxi), compared with Zhouzhuang, Jinxi is more quiet, no crowds, and there are few noisy shops, except for a few attractions, the ancient town has no tickets. Jinxi ancient town should have about two thousand years of history, because Chen Tong tomb, once known as "Chen Tomb" after the name "Jinxi." Jinxi bridges are numerous, the density is even more than Suzhou. Visited the ancient town, the South most like Jinxi, the North loves Pingyao.

Went to the New Year, took the parents and family to play together, there were many people at that time, the scenery of the ancient town was beautiful, the feeling of the river country in the south of the Yangtze River was very strong, the social stage, the promenade, plus the blue sky and white clouds, constituted a beautiful picture scroll! It is recommended to avoid a long holiday on the weekend, it is worth a visit.

Located in the south of Kunshan City, the lakeside of Dianshan is a thousand-year-old Jiangnan water town. The ancient town is not big, China landscape paintings like the ancient lotus bridge, mysterious Chen Shuiyu attracts tourists to explore, various folk collections are also worth visiting, there are various snack shops on the old street. The old street is free, the collections sell the package ticket to visit.

reviews: Great expericnce and scenic spot. Beautiful trees and ecosystem and ancient places and Chinese culture.
this amazing garden stole my heart.its natural with a very pleasant view that nourishes you with peace and whelm.specially the shadows down the water reflecting the image is amazing.
Very pleasant garden and beautiful scenic spots. it’s a well maintained garden.
Such a beautiful and amazing experience. Perfect place to go clear your head and learn more about Chinese history and culture. Went early in the morning with very few tourist, which was perfect!

Tranquility, serenity and calm is what describes Humble Administrator Garden. Ideal time to visit is early morning around 8 am. Avoid public holidays. Entry tickets will be booked online, i recommend trip. Com site. Simply majestic historical place.

attractions.name: Impression Sanjie Liu (Evening Showtime)
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Guangxi, Guilin, Yangshuo, Impression Sanjie Liu (Evening Showtime)
attractions.address: China Minjiang Mountain Water Theater, 1 Tianyuan Road, Yangshuo County, Guilin City
reviews: The show was certainly enjoyable, but the one at the romance park was significantly better in my opinion. Your hotel and people on the streets will try to sell you the tickets for significant markups, but the tickets can be purchased at the theatre entrance for 128RMB, so be aware of that - I recommend just renting a bike and driving out there on your own. Also, don’t be concerned about which seat you get because many people get up and move to better seats (even down to VIP) once the show starts anyway so the seat numbers become essentially meaningless (however this might be different if the theatre is busier and there are less seats open, but I was there during winter and COVID so there was a lot of free space). All in all, I’d the show is worth seeing. There is nothing particularly spectacular about it but it’s still something to enjoy after you’ve had your share of mountain views and West Street snacks.
My impression ~ it was epic. So beautiful and well choreographed.

explore, discover, learn about the local culture through music, the art of dancing, and the pure pleasure of experiencing technology blended with nature at its very best through sight and hearing!   too good to be true?  try it!  it’s a life time memory you will always treasure!

We don't have performances like this back at home so this whole thing was really something different for me. Every single person was so well organized and synchronized, it was mesmerizing. One action led to another and I was out of words every time. My hostel was kind enough to help me with booking. Beautiful show, highly recommended!
This is a very beautiful place

Surprising good and clean! Really like the boat ride and tour guide is friendly.

The Tianyuan is located on the Guiyang Highway in Baisha Town, Yangshuo County, Guilin City, which is a national AAAA-level attraction. It is mainly composed of lotus pond, swallow lake, swallow cave, Tongxiang style and primitive tribe. In the world, Taoyuan can also enjoy the architecture and life habits of the Dai, Zhuang and Miao ethnic groups, understand the local customs and customs, in the world, trace Tao Yuanming's artistic conception, verify the concentration of Guilin landscape.

There are several Xanadu scenic spots in China, and I have had the honor to visit one or two. The Xanadu scenic spot in Yangshuo County really feels like a paradise, especially after passing through the Swallow Cave, it suddenly becomes clear and sees others, like a home in the world.

The scenery is good, mainly the weather is good, the scenic spot is not big, take a boat and walk back, it will be about 1 hour. It was slightly cold when I went, it is said that the weather was good, such as throwing hydrangea folk dance, but I didn't see it.

reviews: peaceful easy feeling! do you want to feel like you stepped into a dream? have you ever wondered if those beautiful scenic majestic scenes in the movies with the limestone pinnacles are real?   then make your reservation to float the Yulong River by real bamboo rafts.   too good to be true?  try it!   I promise. you will like it if you want to experience something very surrealistic.

You can enjoy this river at mamy different sites. Its recommended to rent a bike and go for a ride along the road just adjacent to Shili Gallery Bridge. You will get many breathtaking views along this path. Ch Evening time before sunset.is recommended.
The Yulong River raft is worth it! One can expirience a fantastic scenery on a calm river. It is better than every tour in the Li River. On the bamboo boats 2 persons can be seated.
Nature at its best, one of the must visit when in china, well maintained and well connectwd with transportation.
You should definitely go here. The trip with the bamboo boat is something special. The view is insane and you feel very close to nature.

attractions.name: Guilin Romance Park
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Guangxi, Guilin, Yangshuo, Guilin Romance Park
attractions.address: Qianguqing Avenue, Yangshuo County, Guilin City
reviews: Nice show to watch with 5yo child! artists are professional and show is very colorful! Good way to find more about Guilin/Yangshuo culture and history. My child can't forget it

"Guilin's ancient love" one eye millennium, not only moved. With a day, in exchange for the millennium reincarnation, today I came to Guilin's ancient scenes, to see Guilin's history and culture and national customs. The meaning of travel is to witness different life scenery between walking, regardless of age, regardless of wind and rain, perhaps because of such open-minded, can get the old and young happy, rain and rain are appropriate.

Ancient tender feelings pass on the world, with the most advanced stage technology to deduce this passage through time and space epic love story. Must talk about the stage effect! Reality is shocked! Landscape, garden, lighting, props and all hidden underwater stage virtual and reality combination! To you really extraordinary visual feast have to say, a hard-to-find "Guilin forever love" must be your trip to Guilin must pass.

The famous performances that have been heard about the ages before coming recreate the history and culture and legends of Guilin for thousands of years. Step by step, the visual performances bring the audience into the scenes. The passages of the story are clear. The visual creative effect is full. The whole process will be pleasantly surprised. The price is also reasonable and is actually known as a life-long must-see performance.

There are a lot of things to see in this scenic spot. It is summarized in a sentence as "Give me a day, return you to a thousand years." All the experience can be worth the ticket price. It reproduces the historical culture and national customs of Guilin. The old and young are happy, and the rain and shine are suited. Liu Sanjie is the "Gexian" of Guilin, here is a Sanjie Temple, like her can go in and worship. The next corridor is hung with wishing cards, the wind blows will sound like a wind bell, very pleasant. Further in the Yangshuo ancient village, The city streets here will be farming life style and vivid, it is very kind.

Shili Gallery

reviews: we drove along those route from the airport to our accommodation. It is so beautiful and unique you don't know where to look.  In some respect its better than the built up areas where construction and buildings take away from the view.

Book a Hotel near West Street. Rent a bike for about  25-30 yuan with security deposit of about 200 yuan. And have a ride along Shili Gallery. Consider the weather conditions,must not be sweating, otherwise you will not enjoy the site. You can visit Gold Water Cave, Moon Hill and Traditional Show site along the route!

The scene of the Dafengshu in the Guilin Yangshuo Gallery, the large calligrapher and writer He Jingsha's "Guilin Landscape Song" large stone carvings, the smooth calligraphy as the old man's poems as smooth. He Lao's long poem "Back to Yan'an" we know. He Lao wrote "Guilin Landscape Song" in 1959 in Guilin, later generations of the legend! "The god in the clouds, the fairies in the fog, the immortal appearance of Guilin mountains! Love is as deep as, the dream is as beautiful, like the dream of the river water!"

Every time to Yangshuo Shili Gallery must go to the place, slowly enjoy the scenery on both sides of Shili Gallery is very beautiful, go to the Moon Mountain to see this Moon Mountain, every time is constantly taking pictures, this is ghost axes magic, nature has such a good scene.

Shili Gallery is a scenic area in Yangshuo, and it is only worth a visit if you don't want to go to West Street. Best transportation plan: After taking a cruise ship to the Lijiang River, arrive at Yangshuo Pier, take a sightseeing bus for 15 yuan to Fengming Bus Station (near Yangshuo Bus Terminal, the shuttle bus back to Guilin will depart at the terminal, 35 yuan, 70 minutes), Fengming Bus Station has a free shuttle bus to Shili Gallery Scenic Area, Every half an hour, it takes about half an hour to go round and back, and it is very convenient to calculate the time. In Shili Gallery, there is a free shuttle bus to Yulong River scenic spot, which is transferred to the Gongnong Bridge. The Gongnong Bridge is the intersection of the two roads in the scenic spot, and it is also the best place for the scenery. This time the drone, except for the weather almost, the scenery is still good.

Large banyan

reviews: Dayushu Scenic Area is located opposite Jianshan Temple in Yangshuo County. This scenic spot is a part of the key scenic spot of Lijiang River in Guilin. Dayushu, also known as the Millennium Ancient Crane and the Chuanyan Ancient Crane, is 17 meters high and surrounded by trees 7.05 meters. The huge crown covers two acres of wide land. Yangshuo Dafengshu Scenic Area is about 6 kilometers from the county town and 70 kilometers from Guilin City, including Guyi Park, Moon Mountain Park and Yue Shang Road attractions.

During the epidemic, the maple branches were full of leaves, indeed can be called large. It is said that in 2020, there are still some flooded sediments on the branches, and the big maple trees are also experienced. Yangshuo Shili Gallery, Butterfly Spring, Big maple trees, Moon Mountain. . The scenery is beautiful and the eyes are pleasing. It is recommended to strengthen the cultural creation of attractions.

Actually, I don’t know Third Sister Liu, but I heard from the tour guide that since there was this third sister Liu, an industrial chain has been formed in Guilin. There are image ambassadors, performances, folk songs, souvenirs, and this big banyan tree, which is the last in the movie. The tree with Brother Aniu is actually a tree with a buffalo and a white horse. Hey, it’s pitiful for animals to be controlled by humans like this.
Do not climb the Moon Mountain, you must book it one hour in advance or wait for the big banyan tree. However, if the Moon Mountain is able, it must climb up. I definitely do not regret it.

Dayushu scenic spot is located in Gaotian Town, Yangshuo County, Guilin City, which was listed as one of the national scenic spots in 1982. Dayushu has been over 1400 years old, like a giant mushroom, this attraction is famous for the movie "Liu Sanjie".

attractions.name: Little Venice
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, France, Grand Est, Alsace, Haut-Rhin, Colmar, Little Venice
attractions.address: Quai de la Poissonnerie, 68000, Colmar, France
reviews: beautiful

The town of Colmar is a very beautiful ancient water town in France. The rivers here are crisscrossed with various bright flowers on both sides. The natural environment is very elegant and tranquil. Taking a boat tour of the small town of Colmar, the scenery is very unique, or walking on the small roads of the town of Colmar, feeling the romantic feelings of South France, is also a very good enjoyment and travel experience.

Colmar is called Little Venice. Colmar is a colorful town like a fairy tale. It combines many German and French styles. It is the inspiration for the design of Hayao Miyazaki's animation Hal's mobile castle. Petite Venise is the old town of Colmar. The buildings on both sides of the canal are designed in pastel colors and wood. In the summer, flowers bloom and green. It is a romantic attraction that everyone must visit when they come to Colmar.

It is said that Koma is the little Venice of France, I think the style is quite different. Komar, I look beautiful during the day, that is, there are many houses with North German style, but the more beautiful it gets later, the sense of fairy tales suddenly rises.

I haven't been to Venice in Italy, and I first came to Colmar in France. It's very close to Switzerland, so I left a country by accident. In my eyes, European countries are like provinces in China. The small town of Colmar has a winding river and is known as Little Venice. Sitting in the restaurant by the river and watching the scenery, or boating the river, are good choices. As for standing on the bridge to see the scenery? There are too many people and the experience is too bad.

attractions.name: Museum Bartholdi
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, France, Grand Est, Alsace, Haut-Rhin, Colmar, Museum Bartholdi
reviews: The Bartholdi Museum is a unique and ancient house. The sculpture with 108 human heads on the outer wall is also called the House of Heads. Although the name sounds a bit scary, the building is actually very beautiful and full of artistic atmosphere, which is definitely worthy of everyone to come and appreciate.

The small town of Colmar, France. There are 105 heads on this building. Each head has a different look. They are the work of the famous sculptor Bartholdi. Bartholdi is the designer of the famous Statue of Liberty. Therefore, there are many triangular road signs of the Statue of Liberty on the ground of the town. . This building is a must-visit attraction in Colmar and is currently a hotel.

This museum was built to commemorate the famous local sculptor Bartholdier. I don’t know if this is his former residence, but it contains his living furniture and other things. There is also a statue of him at the door. A fountain built.

Bartholdi was a well-known local sculptor in Colmar in the 19th century. He was also the author of the Statue of Liberty given to the United States by France at that time, so he was also the pride of Colmar, a small city. This museum displays his collection and works.

This person is the creator of the Statue of Liberty in the United States, and he is also a soul figure that connects the friendship bridge between France and the United States. Therefore, this place attracts many tourists from European and American countries to visit.

attractions.name: Jade Dragon Snow Mountain
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, Jade Dragon Snow Mountain
attractions.address: 15 km north of Lijiang Old Town, Yulong County, Lijiang City
reviews: Took a didi from Lijiang to the cable car base. Its low season so there were still tickets available to buy, there are lots of queues to get on the bus and on the cable car but we are used to that travelling in China. The mountain is beautiful and it was amazing to get to the top and see the glacier up close. We didn't take any oxygen with us, just climbed the stairs slowly and rested often. The blue moon lakes were very pretty too.

Mesmerising. The mountain's peaks can be seen from the old town of Lijiang and every different angle is breathtaking. We went with the hope of hiking up to one of the peaks but unfortunately there's no way to (unless with a guided tour group or taking the cable car). There are many sights to see around the scenic area such as the as the lakes and Yak farms.If your passing by Lijiang it's definitely worth the visit!

A good day trip but you have to prepared for the crowd of people. Foreigners are not allowed to but ticket online so they have to join a group and but a ticket through an agent. They also require to have a 5 days valid covid test to get to the park.

Beautiful place to go it's value for money. I 've joining tour with Chinese and I can't understand Chinese. They kindly help me too much.I would like to recommend this place if you come to Lijiang. There are beautiful attractions both mountains and waterfall. Good tourism management.

Picture perfect view on a crisp & sunny winter day in Dec 2019, just as in the pictures that one sees for Lijiang. easily walkable from May part of the old town should you be staying there, maximum 30-40 minutes if you stay at the far end of the old town. if your knees don’t bother you, I would recommend walking to Dragon Pool through the town. Deep green blue pool with the mountain rising in the background crowned with snow late December (perhaps there may not be any snow earlier on the year). The mountain plays peekaboo as you walk through the old town and seems like a watchful guardian of the town. Streams gurgle from the Dragon Pool into the town

attractions.name: Lugu Lake
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, Lugu Lake
attractions.address: Lugu Lake Town, Ninglang County, Lijiang City
reviews: Ligue lake is a beautiful scenic spot in the Yunnan-Sichuan border. We arrived there from Kunming by bus, and although the trip is quite long (5-6 hours), the views along the way are stunning, and Lugu lake is totally worth the detour. There are several villages along the lake where one can stay, the ambiance is quite calm, and there are nice roads to walk around.
The water in some areas is a vivid blue. It's better to spend at least two days, to explore most of the scenic area, which is huge.

The proposition that the route from Lijiang to Wuhu seems a bit strange. Because there is a direct shuttle bus to the Wuhu Bus Station at Lijiang Bus Station, only there are fewer shuttle buses, about two trips a day. Ticket price is more than 71 yuan. There are also tourist buses that can be boarded from all over Lijiang's ancient city. The ticket price is 40 yuan. This is really cheap. But we are used to taking public transportation at passenger stations. We are afraid that if there is a problem in the later period, it is convenient to solve it. I checked it out. The journey from Lijiang to Ninglang is two-thirds of to Wuhu. The ticket price for this journey is 35 yuan. The last paragraph should be enough for a maximum of 20 yuan. And the shuttle bus to Ninglang will start at 8 am, and you can transfer to Wuhu early. But the situation is not so simple. Although Wuhu is a subordinate of Ninglang County, but, it may be that the local people go there directly less people, there is no special passenger shuttle, but they call the village minibus. To Wuhu cross the road, the fare to buy the end point 30 yuan. More troublesome is that this shuttle does not start at Ninglang Bus Station, but at the hospital near the bus station. The appearance of the bus does not have the spray mark of the village passenger transportation ～ The village passenger transportation we see in Guizhou and other places is obviously sprayed. This Ninglang country passenger car is really small, only 8 seats. Although tossing this, everyone just saved 6 yuan, but, in Ninglang County, the feeling of the Yi people, Ninglang Theatre, Museum, buildings, different from other ethnic groups. It's not that time is tight. I should stay here for one night. Is it originally a tour to stroll around and enjoy different exotic customs? [Smile] [Smile]. When I arrived at Wuhu Inn, the boss knew that we were coming by country coach, he said great. Estimated that foreign tourists who come to Wuhu are the only two of us to enter the scenic spot in this way! Haha

One word: beautiful! Two words: beautiful! It is the only place where Mosuo people live in China, but the younger sister of Mosuo is really not good to see ah [sweeping] General Lijiang newspaper group has been a two-day tour in the past, slightly rushed, now the empty B&B in Lugu Lake is really much, in fact, you should be able to live for three or five days, the slow life of recreation, think is also excellent!

Jiang Ji/Travel Notes of Lugu Lake

The vast majority of Lugu Lake belongs to the boundary of Lijiang, but like Erhai Lake, it is regarded as an independent scenic spot. It takes about three and a half hours to drive from Lijiang to Lugu Lake. Self-driving people traveling to Lijiang are usually caught by various people. Persuaded to charter, because the mountain road is not easy to drive. Is it really hard to drive? not necessarily. At least I went there properly. It is also a merchant's routine to come. After all, making money is very important.
Lugu Lake is indeed extraordinary.
The first is that the richness of the scenery of Lugu Lake is much greater than that of Erhai Lake, and the second is that the location of the viewing area is varied, so you can experience many different feelings of the same scenery. For example, Caohai, which is an area connected to the marriage bridge, thick and bright green grasses are distributed in large chunks on the lake surface, like a rich emerald, the water head is extremely plump, and the sky clouds match it. Suddenly the painting is full of oil painting style, and you can give praise without hesitation. What's not simple is that Caohai also incorporates folk customs like walking the marriage bridge. While enjoying the beautiful scenery, you can learn about some humanistic stories, and you can also extend it, because the scenic area is connected to the tribal villages of ethnic minorities, with a wide range and plenty of time. Really can walk around for a day. The sea of grass can be felt at close range, as if the freshness of the grass always surrounds it.
There are also magnificences that can be seen from a high place, such as the altar. You only need to climb up a little bit to see the place. Sitting in the pavilion or standing on the viewing platform, you can see the entire lake in your eyes. With the dazzling sunlight, you can see the brilliance of countless diamonds moving on the water surface. It is also far away from the mountains and the sky. Enjoy the cool breeze while chanting words, beautiful and beautiful. Of course, there are also scenic spots like Sunset Bay at Lover Beach, which are very peaceful and soothing. In addition to the crystal clear lake, there are ancient and vigorous trees, and there are boats of the Mosuo tribe. Throwing a stone in the lake, making an arc of ripples, is really beautiful. If Tiangongzuomei really has sunset clouds, sitting there for a few hours is absolutely likable. Many people like to go to Tibet to purify their souls. I think it is the same in Lugu Lake. Besides, she is not desolate but gentle. Lugu Lake and the Lige Peninsula have been developed well to meet the business demands of many travelers. There are inns with beautiful lakeside views, bars and cafes where you can relax, and many restaurants, which solve the problem of eating, lodging and traveling. The demand is still a place similar to a large lakeside park, so it is not too much to become a must-see. When I was drinking tea at a lakeside cafe there, I admired the blooming of watery flowers. It was very enchanting, and combined with that dish, I felt a lot of extra points. Lugu Lake is suitable for two days. After all, such a quiet and beautiful place is rare, and it is also spacious. There are many worth seeing along the lake, most of which don't need to spend money, except for the ticket to Lugu Lake. There are a lot of food there. I personally recommend wild mushroom soup hot pot, which tastes good and the price is right. As for living, the basic choices are homestays, and you get what you pay for, and you can choose according to your own disposition. I don't care much about those, after all, the scenery is so beautiful, it must be recommended.

attractions.name: Lashi Lake
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, Lashi Lake
attractions.address: Anshang Village, Lashi Seaview District, Gucheng District, Lijiang City
reviews: 17 years and his wife went to Lijiang to pull the city sea boating, at first or very hesitant not to row, then still muster up courage to try a few times, then the wife also trembling to get on the boat to adapt for a while no problem, [scene] [interest] [price/performance] is really very good!

Lashihai is a wetland nature reserve in Lijiang, Yunnan. It is located in the middle of Yulong County, Lijiang City, about 10 kilometers away from the ancient city of Lijiang. Now it has become a plateau lake that maintains a certain water level. The mirror-like surface of the lake reflects the Yulong Snow Mountain. It has the unique atmosphere of plateau wetlands. It is recommended to visit with ample time. One day is enough to visit, mainly horse riding and walking along the plank road to feel the nature Scenery, you can go back and forth on the same day. Lashi Haijing District is better than it is close to the urban area of Lijiang, but the area that can be visited is not too large. The entire tour route is circular, mainly including the Wetland Museum, the Bird Watching Corridor, the Dongba Festival Museum, the Zodiac Avenue, Swan Lake, glass plank road, moon bay promenade, sea view wooden plank road and other attractions, the price of 30 yuan per person is not too expensive. For ecological protection, boating is now not allowed. Walking on the wooden plank road of the bird-watching promenade, there are wetland scenery on both sides, and some waterfowls swim around on the water from time to time, many of which are protected by the state. Walking into Lashihai, you are full of comfort and comfort. The calm and clear lake is like a large mirror, reflecting the blue sky and white clouds, and the breeze blows on the lake surface with circles. There are usually minivans to go to the ancient city of Lijiang, to Lashi Hainan or Haibei. Haibei is close to the island in the lake, while Hainan is the Lashihai resort. You must bargain a good price when you charter a car, usually around 100-200 yuan. The driver earns horseback riding fees. There are dozens of horse farms in Lashiha, and the price of play is not fixed. In fact, the route you choose is the same. No matter how much money you spend, you follow the general route. Don’t imagine riding a horse on the grassland. Basically, you’ll be walking the whole journey. Riding in the field is usually only around the lake. The price is about tens of yuan. Riding around the lake costs more than 100 yuan. Bargaining is necessary. Time is enough.

I have been to Lashihai for five consecutive years. Every year I grow vegetables in a new clubhouse, take beautiful photos, ride horses, and eat local chicken hot pot. Not tired of it. Speaking of Yunyun Racecourse, friends who have been to Lijiang should be familiar with it. He was demolished and changed, but after the epidemic ended, he got better and better. Lashi Haimachang has always been a place to be scolded online, but no matter how online people complain, cloud business will always be the best. Good reputation, uniform price, good environment and good service. It can only be said that those tourists who are dragged to Lashihai on the street are greedy for petty gains. This situation can happen in any tourist city. On the National Day of 2020, I came to Yunyun Racecourse again for a vacation. Today, I played the happiest swing with three children, had the best small hot pot meal, and the ethnic minorities sang for fun. You can feel their smiles. From the bottom of my heart, this is more than any big coffee can be moved 😹 So let’s look at the picture, it’s fun, everyone feels differently!
The scenery is general, there are places to find ways to make money, there are places for children to play. Shopping is not mandatory, after entering, the process is followed in order.

The scenery is very personal, and the viewing is very comfortable. The Naxi culture part in front has fat Jinge with explanation, which is still very interesting. Some small knowledge is absorbed. Overall is still good.

attractions.name: Mufu Palace
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, Mufu Palace
attractions.address: No. 49, Guangyuan Lane, Guanyi Street, Dayan Town, Gucheng District, Lijiang City
reviews: Mufu tickets are 40 yuan, which is not cheap. Fortunately, the ancient city of Lijiang does not charge maintenance fees now, and it is worth visiting the Tumen of Naxi toast in those years. But this Mufu was also later rebuilt, so many buildings look new.

The old castle was originally a puppet of the Toji clan, a hereditary domain of Lijiang, and it was located at the east foot of the old castle shiojiyama Kifu Fu. The area of Kifu is 46 mu, and there are 162 large and small rooms in the prefecture, and the axis is 369 meters, and the three Qingden, tamanmakiro, kobiro, gohoden, and the Council Chamber are arranged from west to East. The hanging inside is a collection of 11 pieces of the imperial plaques from successive emperors, reflecting the history of the Mu clan's prosperity and decline. The TV drama "Mu Fu Fengyun" about the Mu clan's toast is shot here.

Go to Mufu to know, the ancient costume film and TV drama "Mufu wind" is shot in Mufu. It is said to be the first CCTV ratings of 200 million yuan of the television series. In addition to the theme is good, it seems, the scenery of Mufu is also very relevant. The woodhouse is a beautiful place with all kinds of buildings and gardens from all angles.

People who have been to Lijiang will not be strange to Muwangfu, if choose to live in the inn near Mufu, the feeling is quite different. Backed by Lion Mountain, adjacent to the Muwangfu, the Zhiyun Residence Inn, almost full of the ancient city, can see every day from morning to night sunbathing the ancient city, and the rooms are quaint ethnic elements let you rest in another atmosphere, leisurely.

The Old Town Museum of Lijiang is the official residence of Lijiang Tusi. It is huge in scale, nearly 1,000 meters long. There is also a mountain-Lion Peak in the mansion, which has excellent Feng Shui. This is a must visit place when you come to Lijiang Old Town.

attractions.name: Yulong Snow Mountain Cableway
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, Yulong Snow Mountain Cableway
reviews: In the Yulong Snow Mountain Cableway, visitors can take the cableway from the lower station of the cableway in Ganhaizi to the Glacier Park at an altitude of 4506 meters. After getting off the ropeway, along the wooden plank road laid on the glacier, you can climb to the highest point of 4680 meters above sea level, and feel the charm of snow-capped mountains and glaciers up close.

Big cableway of Yulong Snow Mountain, you must book tickets in advance, otherwise there is not necessarily a ticket on site. The cableway rises from the lower station of more than 3000 meters to 4506 meters in a few minutes, very amazing speed. The scenery is beautiful, must be enjoyed well.

Come to Lijiang must come to Yulong Snow Mountain, come to Yulong Snow Mountain must take a big cableway to browse the snow mountain holy scenery. If you have physical strength, you can climb the highest viewing platform, no physical strength can take photos on the platform of more than 4500. The performance is still very shocking and worth seeing. After the online decision, the travel society sends a text message and will call the next day to inform the attention of the precautions. The main thing is to pay attention to the time of the large ropeway. It is convenient to use the ID card to verify the whole process. Overall is excellent,

There is the Yulong Snow Mountain Cableway in Lijiang, Yunnan. Take the cableway to the Glacier Park and experience the charm of the glacier up close. The Yulong Snow Mountain Cableway is one of the three ropeways in the Yulong Snow Mountain Scenic Area and the most popular one.
Good scenery, fun and fun, overall awesome, the big sister is very responsible, said very detailed, very patient, people are especially good, recommended.

attractions.name: The Romantic Show of Lijiang
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Yunnan, Lijiang, The Romantic Show of Lijiang
attractions.address: No. 88 Yuxing West Road, Yulong Naxi Autonomous County, Lijiang City
reviews: A must-see performance in a lifetime, Lijiang’s eternal love, is absolutely enjoyable, especially the Tibetan mystery, which tells the profound traditional culture of the Tibetan people, and the live radio is more appealing on the stage! It is very suitable as the arrangement for the last day of Lijiang trip! Lijiang Qiangu Scenery Area can be entered after the park opens at ten o'clock in the morning, and the last performance of the performance ends at nine o'clock in the evening. Here is a set of views from various angles inside the Lijiang Eternal Scenery Zone. No matter how many sets, you can't summarize everything, just wait for you to feel it slowly. There are also many types of beautiful food in the scenic area, all of which are very distinctive, and are controlled in terms of safety and health. You can rest assured to enjoy the wonderful places of the past, especially in the ability to show the essence of local culture to the audience through this form of performance, and both young and old It should be easy to understand communication. One of the most fascinating performances is the "Legend of Horse Caravan". Lijiang is famous for the ancient tea-horse road. In a sense, Lijiang’s glory is the glory of horseshoes; for thousands of years, in the rugged tea-horse Every day on the ancient road, the life movement of the caravans is staged!

The large-scale singing and dancing "Eternal Love in Lijiang" is different from ordinary stage performances. The performance brings together many ethnic elements. "Let’s talk about legendary stories such as Lijiang's representative folk symbols and cultural consultation.

Lijiang's ancient performances. The performances start from the origin of the Naxi people, then tell the story of the ancient tea and horse road, and finally to the beauty of the south of today's Caiyun, the story of Yunnan, the history and changes of Yunnan through the stage to show the whole. There are many legends about Naxi romance, the Wuhu-side wedding people always with a romantic sentiment to move the heartstrings of tourists to Yunnan. And Lijiang love song, telling is the Naxi love story. The performance in the open-air theater, mainly tells the Li ethnic youth to give safe residence, the brave devotion story. In the process of joining the relationship with the female owner, and the female owner's unwillingness, let the youth devotion let people groan and sigh. Lijiang love song adopts the mode of the actual performance, and along with the drama progress, the stage will appear water, fire and other special effects, very shocking. When the sunset dyed red snowy mountain beach, the performance of the mystery is just started. I have always had an inexplicable longing for Tibet, in fact the mysterious Tibetan Buddhism influence is not only the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, the cloud high plateau also deeply influenced by Tibetan Buddhism. "Tibet Mystery" is about an old aunt from Shangri-La to the pilgrimage to Lhasa. The performance of the mystery, grand, from the beginning of the big turn to the actor bowed and reappeared on the pilgrimage road, as if I also led to the holy pilgrimage road, following those who believe in the heart of the hope and peace. In the performance, also interspersed with a lot of Tibetan characteristics of the performance, the end of the whole play with the old Ama soul to the kingdom of heaven, perhaps the pilgrimage road is full of hardships, perhaps the result may not be as satisfactory, but the heart always find their own belonging, perhaps this is the meaning of the hidden mystery.

"Tibet Mystery" performance in Lijiang's ancient scenes, faith is an infinite force, regardless of status, stage prologue slowly unfolds, a light paved the road, old Ama kneeling on the pilgrimage road, her weak body hides the power of piety, The big longing wheel in the sky emits a sound of hope and epiphany. The old Ama went to the top of the mountain and she will go to pilgrimage. This is her wish and hope for life. The old Ama's hands are together and prayed in silence. A pair of wise and compassionate Buddha's eyes rise from the horizon and emit the light of attraction ......

The pick-up driver is very good, the car is very clean, the car is very stable, the booked ticket can be directly ID card, convenient. There are no people in the scenic spot during the epidemic, the Hanfu experience is also super good, plus 68 plates and a cloak, the effect is super good!

I would not recommend you to go there during the summer time, because it's rain season there, so there's a risk not to see even a half of the mountain and the glacier on the summit. Anyway, I got there in the worst possible time for traveling around and still highly enjoyed it!
amazing! a must go for sure. we had horrible weather and still was worth it. very beuatiful and unique

Shuhe is one of the nicest ancient towns ive visited in China, while a lot of ancient towns have the same shops and silar vibe, Shuhe has a side of nature and still a cultural soul that has started to dissapear in other towns, we had lots of “wow” moments.
The old town is not far from Lijiang old town.It’s worth to go there as several view points are there.
This is a quiet Old Town in Lijiang. It isn’t as busy, and the people are easy to work with. Check out the bakery inspired by Paris, France. The pasteries are delicious.
