reviews: Lake Wakatipu is an inland lake in the South Island of New Zealand. It is in the southwest corner of the Otago region, near its boundary with Southland.Lake Wakatipu comes from the original Māori name Whakatipu wai-māori.
I visited Queenstown for 5 days and wandered around the lake every day happily. it's a very beautiful and peaceful lake with many ducks and seagulls and people like to gather there in the evening.

The Wakatipu Lake is super clear, crystal and beautiful! There are some amazing hotels along the lake. Cuz the lake is quite big, so there is water taxi for visitors to view the whole Wakatipu Lake easily. Also, there are so many water activities you can do, such as kayaking, jetboat and so on. What a great place!
Longest lake in NZ, located in South Island next to Queenstown, which is on the north shore of the lake close to eastern end of its mid section.
Love the willows by The lake and the Earnslaw Ferry which give a nice view of Queenstown and Wakapitu Lake. The lake area near Glenorchy is pretty too with more mountain view.

attractions.name: Milford Sound
attractions.loc_tags: Oceania, New Zealand, Southland, Southland District, Fiordland National Park, Milford Sound
attractions.address: Te Anau, Fiordland National Park 9679, New Zealand
reviews: Milford Sound is a fiord in the southwest of New Zealand’s South Island.It’s known for towering Mitre Peak, plus rainforests and waterfalls like Stirling and Bowen falls, which plummet down its sheer sides. The fiord is home to fur seal colonies, penguins and dolphins.Milford Discovery Centre and Underwater Observatory offers views of rare black coral and other marine life. Boat tours are a popular way to explore.

We started our journey to Milford Sound. The interior cabin of the boat was very modern, sitting in comfortable seats, drinking free coffee and milk tea, eating snacks and enjoying the landscape from the large sightseeing window. The steep mountains on both sides of the river are constantly regressing, boats on the lake surface, leaving a scar on the lake, in the unconscious, is "the light boat has passed the mountains. " On both sides of the mountain, from time to time you can see a waterfall, Xu is the reason of the rain all the year round, all the way, here and there are different kinds of large and small waterfalls, or as a thin line down, or as a white train in the mountain, or delicate and beautiful, or the vast water, so that we have a good eye. Feel the wind blowing on both sides of the deck, breathing the pure air, clear water, as if walking in poetry.

The must-see fjord in New Zealand is also one of the most popular. There are many small fjords that are not accessible to ordinary tourists. Taking a bus from Queenstown will have to go over the mountains and mountains. Depart early in the morning and return after dark. The effect of raining on cloudy days is discounted, but the advantage is that you can see the rainbow. There are some simple meals on board that you can buy and eat yourself. It's pretty tiring all day. This fjord is not as spectacular as the Norwegian fjord.

Milford Sound is to New Zealand what the Great Wall of China is to China. There is a way: you are not a hero if you do not reach the fjords. Milford Sound is located on the southwest side of the South Island of New Zealand. The distance between Queenstown and the fjord is more than 100 kilometers in a straight line. Due to the obstacle of mountains, it is necessary to detour to Te Anau. Queenstown to Te Anau, 170 kilometers, 2.5 hours by car; Te Anau to Fjord, 120 kilometers, 2 hours by car. The long and narrow Milford Sound stretches 22 kilometers inland from the coast, 2 kilometers at its widest point and 400 meters at its narrowest point. In the fjord, there are not only rugged cliffs, undulating peaks, dense rainforest, but also waterfalls, rapid waves hitting the shore, and the sea and the sky. The natural scenery of the fjord is vividly and vividly reflected, which is dizzying and beautiful. Visiting Milford Sound and taking a sightseeing cruise is the best choice. Departing from the cruise ship terminal to the estuary of the Tasman Sea, the whole journey is 32 kilometers and takes about 110 minutes. Along the way, enjoy the beautiful scenery of the bay and mountains on the deck, say hello to the seals basking in the sun beside the seal rock, and get wet with the water of the waterfall that can make you 10 years younger under the waterfall~ feel comfortable, So uncomfortable. If time is loose, some niche gameplays can be tried: take a helicopter to overlook the fjord scenery, kayak in the fjord to break the waves and hit the water, explore the secrets of the canyon along the Milford Trail~ Tips: Opposite the Milford Sound Cruise Terminal The Mitre Peak is the iconic landscape of the fjord and the business card of New Zealand tourism. You must check in and take a photo.
Glacier Sightseeing on New Zealand's South Island, one of the must-see attractions in New Zealand.

attractions.name: Queenstown NZONE Skydive
attractions.loc_tags: Oceania, New Zealand, Otago, Queenstown Lakes District, Queenstown, Queenstown NZONE Skydive
reviews: Wonderful experience! I am 53 years old now, but I have been so excited action this vacation in queenstown!

Skydiving in Queenstown is definitely an outdoor sport that is worth coming to experience here. Everyone takes a parked plane and flies to an altitude of more than 3,000 meters in the sky, and then jumps off the plane under the leadership of a professional instructor to fly freely in the air. At the same time, a professional photographer will accompany you to take photos for you. It is really a thrilling and enjoyable high-altitude experience.

[Important lessons learned]: If you have a skydiving video, please close your mouth all the way and don't let the wind enter your mouth, it will be ugly and distorted. Also, look at the camera more and interact with gestures a little more, so that it will look more vivid. If you can smile quietly, that's the best. The most important thing is to keep your mouth shut! At 8:30 in the morning, go to the store in the town to assemble and register, and then choose on the spot whether you need to pay extra for shooting. I remember that I saw on the guide before that there are 3 options for photo and video packages, and the price increases sequentially. But there are only two options when it comes to the scene. The first is the hand-held photo and video package, which costs $189. The second is the ultimate high-altitude skydiving package, $329. The first package is simply that you wear GoPro on your head and the coach also wears one on his hand. The screen shot must be a big head shot, there is no scenery, the face was deformed by the wind, and it must be ugly if it is shot at such a close distance! In the second package, in addition to the first equipment, there is another staff member who will jump with you specifically, take the panoramic view for you, and interact with you on the way. In comparison, this one will be more comprehensive and a little better. But the price difference is also relatively large. In my opinion, 99[%] of the people present basically chose package two. And there are obviously more girls parachuting than boys. The parachuting project in Queenstown is divided into three heights, 15,000 feet or 4,500 meters; 12,000 feet or 3,600 meters; and 9,000 feet or 2,700 meters. In this way, generally speaking, the total cost of skydiving is more than three thousand. Anyway, you have to prepare for at least half a day to go skydiving, because you have to drive from town to the base of the skydiving, and then the base has to return to town. You have to wait for your session in the middle, and then you have to change your clothes and train the coach briefly. Take a plane up high in the sky and then land. Finally, we have to wait for the U disk to edit the video. Quite tossing. Xiaoya didn’t make a scream during the entire parachuting process. The coach was still very surprised. For fear that I fainted, he kept asking me "are you OK?" In fact, I just felt pain in my ears, the kind of cochlear pain. , Especially tinnitus, in short, it is very uncomfortable. But I'm not scared at all, so I am smiling hard at the camera, although smiling like crying. The moment you jump down, you have no time to hesitate, because the coach won't ask you, so he jumped. Although weightlessness is severe, you and the coach are tightly tied together, and the sense of security is still very comfortable. I think bungee jumping is more terrible than skydiving. Someone is following the skydiving, and some people are always talking in your ear. Bungee jumping is completely dependent on one's own courage, including the most terrible first step. After a rapid drop to a certain height, the instructor will open the parachute, and then the two of you will start circling slowly in the air, circle by circle, it feels very random, but the landing place is so precise. All this is controlled by the coach behind you, so please enjoy it with your heart, these rare few minutes.

When you come to Queenstown, you must experience the skydiving here. Everyone jumped off the plane from an altitude of more than 3,000 meters under the leadership of the instructor. At a glance, you can see the beauty of Queenstown, the blue lakes, and the rolling snow-capped mountains. We fly above it like birds. It is really amazing and exciting.

The moment I got out of the hatch, I was very nervous. The coach would not communicate with you whether you are ready. After the countdown to three, tilt your head back, let you hold the strap with both hands, and go out at once. It began to spin in the air, just like the skydiving show I've seen on TV before. It was very fun and interesting. At this time, there was no fear and fear at all, and there were various novelties.

attractions.name: AJ Hackett Kawarau Bridge Bungee Center
attractions.loc_tags: Oceania, New Zealand, Otago, Queenstown Lakes District, Queenstown, AJ Hackett Kawarau Bridge Bungee Center
reviews: I tried bungee jumping once in my lifetime, and I had to make an appointment in advance to register, and then arrived at the designated time, weighed, signed a life and death status, and went to the bridge to line up. It was very cold and windy on the bridge. I waited for a long time and it was frozen like a dog. It is recommended that people who want to go can wear more clothes. When I was in line, I didn't meet a small Chinese partner. There were more young people in Europe and the United States. I was joking and enthusiastic throughout the whole process. I was very nervous and in sharp contrast with them. Finally it was my turn, the staff immediately said a few words in Chinese, called me buyaopa, and then asked me yaobuyaoshui? I didn't react the next time, and it took a few seconds to realize that he was asking me if I should touch the water when I went down. Haha, I said no water, and my brain was blank. After all the safety measures have been taken, you will slowly move to the edge of the platform. There are photo spots where the staff will make you wave and smile, but you really can’t laugh at this time. Seeing that I was rather stunned, the working guy asked me if I needed a push, and I said that I would dance by myself. At this time, I couldn’t translate it in English. Don't hesitate next, as soon as you close your eyes, you jump down. The descent speed is too fast, and I bottomed out before I could yell. When I bounced, my body would involuntarily spin around wildly. This was a bit dizzy, and it was over after ten seconds. There will be a small boat stretching towards you towards the olive branch, you just need to grab it, and the two rowing brothers on the boat will chat with you. My companion helped me to record the whole video. She said why you didn't say a word... After the end, there was no discomfort. The towel on the feet was tied very well, and there was no feeling of pulling at all. One jump is more than 1,000 yuan, and there are more than 200 photos and videos. It’s just that the heart before the jump will be scared. It’s just like overcoming the fear and jumping. It’s not scary as you imagined, so don’t hesitate on the platform. The more you drag, the more you are afraid. . I have experienced bungee jumping once in my life, and it feels worthwhile.

The extreme sports you must experience when you come to New Zealand! Adrenaline soaring! With the mentality of having to experience it once in my life, I gritted my teeth and jumped down hahaha. We must weigh ourselves before jumping. New Zealand beef, lamb chops and salmon are so delicious that they are five kilograms fatter than when they started. . . You can purchase pictures or videos after the jump. They are expensive, but they are also a commemorative. There will also be a T-shirt printed with a 43-meter bungee jump, and a free shuttle bus to Queenstown will be provided as a souvenir.

The AJ Hackett Kawarau Bridge in Queenstown is definitely the most famous bridge here, and the clear water of the Kawarau River underneath is impressive. From this bridge, you can experience the fun of bungee jumping. This is also the Queen The most famous outdoor experience project in town will definitely challenge your guts and it is worthy of everyone to try.

An outdoor extreme challenge that is definitely worth going! How can you miss the ancestor of bungee jumping in Queenstown? On the day of the bungee jumping, the weather was bad and there was a light rain, the wind was strong, and it was terribly cold while waiting, so remember not to wear too little and wait on it! In the end, I jumped out and was really shocked for a moment, and then I landed freely and swayed back and forth. Finally, the crew on the boat would hand you the bamboo pole to grab and let you down. Remember to smile at the camera!

When I went to the fruit town, I passed by and went in to visit. First, I went to the visitor center. It is a large building with various souvenirs for sale. Outside the building is the Kawarau River and the bungee iron bridge. The Kawarau River runs through In the canyon, the scenery is good, and the bungee jumping people jump down in the middle of the iron bridge. It seems that there are more people.

attractions.name: Queenstown Gardens
attractions.loc_tags: Oceania, New Zealand, Otago, Queenstown Lakes District, Queenstown, Queenstown Gardens
reviews: An absolutely beautiful park, perfect for those who prefer more relaxing activities. Stroll through and admire the nature, or play a game of frisbee golf throughout the park. Whatever you do, the park will be a lovey backdrop

Queenstown Gardens is a beautiful place on a nice day to take a picnic and relax in the sunshine.  There are hundreds of native bushes and trees to look at as you take a leisurely stroll through the grounds, and if you want to burn off some of that lunch - there are lots of frisbee baskets for you to play disc golf in (you can hire frisbees for just a few dollars from most hostels/sports stores in town)

A pleasant stroll through the botanic gardens is the perfect way to wind down after a morning of adrenaline rushing activities. During my visit in the middle of summer, I loved the shade of the towering trees, the scent of honeysuckle and magnolias, and the endless spanse of grass and slopes along the lakefront, where you can picnic, read, suntan, or just sit and daydream as you gaze over the lake and Remarkables mountain range. You can also walk along to the end of the gardens and follow the trails that wind along the lakefront.

It is worth taking a stroll here while visiting Queenstown. It is a pleasant and relaxing walk. The garden has both local plant varieties and imported leaves. Take time to sit in the garden, breathe in the fresh air, and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere of the outdoor environment. This is a must experience when coming to Queenstown.

Although the weather is cold, there are still many blooming flowers in the garden, which embellish this green grass in colorful. New Zealand was once a British colony, so this old garden is also full of British flavor. Going further, there is a small pond, but seeing small bridges and green trees, pairs of wild ducks, like a fairy tale world. Although the water surface is not calm, the reflection is unexpectedly beautiful, looking like a dream, and the scenery is beautiful.

attractions.name: Walter Peak Farm
attractions.loc_tags: Oceania, New Zealand, Otago, Queenstown Lakes District, Queenstown, Walter Peak Farm
attractions.address: 1 Mount Nicholas-Beach Bay Rd, Walter Peak 9793
reviews: There are many ranches in New Zealand that are particularly beautiful, and you can also see sheepdogs

Steamboat + Walter Plateau Ranch half-day tour is a classic trip to Queenstown. Walter Peak, located on the opposite bank of the lake southwest of Queenstown. Walter Plateau Ranch is located on the west side of the mountain. It is one of New Zealand's oldest plateau pastures, covering an area of 68,000 hectares in its heyday. After several changes, the existing area is 25,000 hectares, and more than 40,000 Merino sheep, Romney sheep and beef cattle are stocked. Since 1991, the owner of the ranch leased 162 hectares of land by the lake to a travel agency and started a "ranch tour" tourism project. Therefore, many tourists feel that "the plateau is not high and the pasture is not big" when visiting. The ranch tour is so beautiful and beautiful. The first is to observe "pastoralism". The "Sheep Shearing Show" is lively and interesting. With the help of the shepherd's fence and the assistance of the shepherd dogs, each of the furry sheep is already bald and cute. "Sheepdogs driving sheep" is vivid and intuitive, with a few shepherd dogs + a group of lambs, allowing visitors to feel every bit of shepherding. "Animal feeding", you can have close contact with alpacas, lambs, and calves, pat and pat ~ too late. The second is to observe the "scene". When you go to the ranch, take a 45-minute voyage by steamboat or a 30-minute voyage by speedboat. The beautiful scenery of lakes and mountains along the way is needless to say. After arriving at the ranch, the east side of the ranch dock is the tourist area, and the west side is the villa area. The "Colonel's House" built in 1902 is the most eye-catching. Because of the tight time, I gave up close contact with small animals and went to the villa area to find out. The white walls are reflected by the red roof, the greenery is lined with flowers, and the scenery is extremely beautiful. In the courtyard, in front of the porch, on the greenery, among the flowers, by the benches, by the lake and beach, you can stroll around and enjoy taking pictures. The third is to taste "food." During the ranch tour, you can choose to have afternoon tea or BBQ buffet. The variety of tea and meals is not rich, but the taste is authentic and delicious, coupled with the elegant environment and harmonious atmosphere, it is also a good experience.

A paradise in Queenstown-Walter Peak Highland Farm

❤️Introduction:
1. The farm is located in Lake Wakatipu and is usually reached by Tss steamboat. Usually it is the itinerary of buying steam boat tickets➕farm cruise➕buffet.
2. You can also rent a speedboat yourself, so you can control the time, but the cost will be more expensive.

3. This plateau pasture does not have any altitude sickness, but it looks like a castle in a fairy tale world and is left alone. The red spire, the white city wall and the surrounding flowers are especially perfect.

Tips:
1. It is recommended to wear white and solid color dresses to take pictures, because the farm has many flowers and the walls are white.
2. Walk along the lake, sparkling, and teal, you can walk a little further, also suitable for shooting silhouettes.

When you come to New Zealand, you must not miss a lively and interesting farm tour, which can fully reflect the close contact with animals and the harmony between man and nature. Alpacas are very timid and docile. The scenery is breathtaking and beautiful, very idyllic. Comfortable here, I can relax and experience the purest New Zealand farm life!

Walter Cape Perk (Walter Perk) is one of the most primitive highland pastures in New Zealand. The ranch is located on the west side of the main peak of Mount Walter across Lake Queens City and is a lovely view, 45 minutes by steamboat in Queenstown to see the shearing of sheep and a buffet is very nice

it is good for family trip, a good place to stroll with many food outlets to try and many photo to snap. when the sun is down, the whole place is lighted up and it gives a different ambience compare to day time.

When you come to Wuzhen, you must live in Xizha. Not only to enjoyed the night view of Wuzhen but also felt the quiet morning beauty here。This time we stayed in a suite on the first floor of the waterside resort。The room is not only large in space, but also antique in layout。Most importantly, the real pillow sleeps on the water. The breakfast in the hotel is also very rich and the waiter's service is warmth。They volunteered to help with car appointments and baggage deliveries, which were free of charge, of course. Wuzhen in the rain has a special taste。This is the place that must come in one's life.
Beautiful place. You can get on a boat, shop around and eat some good food.

attractions.name: East Gate
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Zhejiang, Jiaxing, Tongxiang, Wuzhen, East Gate
reviews: A small bridge flowing water home scenery, the south of the river is like this, and the books in the film and television depicted the south of the river, the most impressive is the conflict of the former residence, did not expect the literary giant from Wuzhen, open eyes!

"Walk into" like water years, feel pillow river home" once said Wuzhen Dongzha, my mind will immediately flash out the scene of "like water years". Liu Ruoying pulls the suitcase to stand in the alley, Li Xinjie sad quiet eyes, hunched up the corner of the mouth leaning in front of the door miss Huang Qi's a smile; Qi Shu is in the high patio, patching up the old yellow book newspapers ...... Wuzhen Dongzha Old Street Academy, the Linjia shop, Fengyuan Shuangqiao, dyeing cloth shop, wine shop and hotel on the edge of Mao Dun's former residence were the shooting sites of the film "Like the Year of the Water". The first stop of the travel destination is Wuzhen, from the Xizha settled accommodation out, first take the free shuttle bus to Dongzha. Compared to Xizha, Dongzha is much smaller, many tourists, mainly a main street. Dongzha lane street is paved with green stone, the right of the entrance is the residential, the left is Dongshihe. Here are selling local specialty, can also buy some tie dyed cloth fans. There are also lively old people in the alleys who have simply converted their homes into shops, bargained with young people, or simply shyly placed goods at the window for pick-and-roll. The most of the "Watery Years" is located in the east gate, the quaint residential along the river bank spread, a quaint green tile white wall, lively shops and inns on the street set, is very lively and bustling. Although the changes in Dongzha have been great for many years, some scenes in the film still remain. The scenic area completely preserves the original style and pattern of the ancient town of the water town in the late Qing and Republic of China. The building elements of the unique Jiangnan style such as the river pavilion, bridge, slate lane and Maodun's former residence are organized by the river-shaped street, the street-bridge connection, the building houses and the water town as one, which embodies the humanistic thought of the Chinese classical folk house "making peace as beauty" and the overall beauty of harmonious coexistence between the natural and humanistic environment. The space charm of the ancient town of Jiangnan Water Town presents. The road of the green stone plate, everywhere is a stone arch bridge. On both sides of the river, with long stone bank, feel very refreshing. Walking in the small long streets of the ancient town, slowly taste the small bridge, water, the charm of the people. This is the real old town, old houses, old streets, old shops, old workshops, a thousand-year-old river, the riverside has a few ancient trees. The old houses here are calm and cold, the corners are denudated into cultural relics, some purple purplish quietly climbed the old house brick walls. If in the old house, reading the Tang poetry and song lyrics, with the ancient sounds, I don't know what the charm. In the courtyard deep, have experienced many years of change, how many cold rain knocked the roof tile, how many awning boat rowed the quiet river. Through the wooden frames, Wuzhen was a nostalgic old man who stood, sat or sat on his knees for thousands of years, old and steady, and certainly vicissitudes and simplicity. A coarse cloth clothing wear 3000 years, a gray pants wear 3000 years, a brown quilt cover 3000 years. 3000 years not heavy makeup, 3000 years not flowering, 3000 years the same color and the true color, this is the true Wuzhen!

Compared with Xizha, Dongzha is more original, retains the ancient dwellings, the life is rich. In the morning, strolling in the rain alley, the most poetic painting, feeling will meet lilac like girls. There are Mao Dun's former residence, ancient pawnshop, wood carving exhibition hall...I especially like to stand on the bridge to see the roof and rocking boat.

Very characteristic of Jiangnan Water Town, the environment is beautiful and there is a sense of tranquility. The characteristic exhibition halls such as the rich coins and the contradiction residences in the town are also sold by the merchants in the town. The souvenirs with local characteristics. The shop scenery is also very poetic. You can also rent a boat to extend the water road to enjoy this other town.

Wuzhen Dongzha and Xizha, by contrast, Dongzha is more lively, the fireworks are rich. If the time is rich, Dongzha Westzha is very good. Look at the former residence of Mao Dun, the former residence of Muxin, and feel the charm of literature.

reviews: The Mu Xin Art Museum is dedicated to commemorating and exhibiting the life effort and aesthetic heritage of the painter, writer and poet Mu Xin. It is not only a museum that collects the past, but also a spiritual and academic space open to the future. Mu Xin said: "If I want to see each other, I am at the intersection of sadness and joy." The completion of Mu Xin Art Museum is the perfect summary of the poet's words.

There really is a sense of water town here. In terms of food, the taste here is relatively light. If you usually like to eat the heavy flavors, I suggest you come here to bring some hot sauce and the like. In this way, you will also feel a little bit more enjoyable when you eat. Such people also like very healthy food. If you are not used to it, you must bring good things.

The view is good, I bought the ticket for Muxin Art Museum~~~~~ I thought it was too expensive, so I didn’t walk around carefully~~~~ I left in the afternoon~~~~ But the view is okay~~~~~~Muxin The art gallery is great~~~~will go next time~~~~~

The design is very good. Those who like Mr. Mu Xin must not miss it. There are many precious manuscripts, some of which cannot be photographed. You can watch it for a day. There is also a small library inside. After reading a book of poems, it is not a problem and there are few people. ,very comfortable

The Mu Xin Art Museum is located in Wuzhen. The museum is dedicated to commemorating and displaying the painter and writer Mu Xin’s life-long efforts and aesthetic heritage. This is not only a museum that collects the past, but also a spiritual and academic space open to the future. There are not many exhibits, so the photos are nice.

attractions.name: Wucun
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Zhejiang, Jiaxing, Tongxiang, Wuzhen, Wucun
attractions.address: 500 meters north of the historical district of Xizha Scenic Spot, Wuzhen, Tongxiang, Jiaxing
reviews: The scenery is good, the rain is drizzle when I go, the village is not big, our family is playing, there are many parent-child projects in it, there are camping tents and you can cook. Overall, it is excellent, cost-effective,

If the villages are like this, I would like to stay in the fields forever and herding horses and sheep~ Transportation: Come out from the Internet Center, show the accommodation certificate in Xizha, and you can still take the free battery car to this stop to continue the tour. It will take about a quarter of an hour to walk here. Reason for recommendation: From a distance, I saw the three characters "Village Committee" inlaid on the plaque, and Wu Village arrived. Wucun is an upgrade of the original natural village-Hongqiao Village. The farm houses and landforms that can be seen are all ancient and have not been dismantled, but the houses have become cleaner and the streets cleaned more neatly. To a certain extent, the original Jiangnan rural style is retained. 1. Fishing. There is no rigorous tour route in Wu Village, so you can only walk along the village committee. The closest is the fish pond. Hongqiao Village is adjacent to the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal. It has rich and delicious aquatic plants, especially fishery, which can be regarded as a major income of farmers in Jiangnan. The fish ponds here not only raise fish and shrimps, but also raise waterfowl and aquatic crops such as water chestnut according to the biological chain. The pond has a natural attraction to the northerners, not to mention the beautiful original pictures, and there can be interactive fishing here, and it is reluctant to leave. 2. Plowing. Plowing in the ground is the norm for farmers. People here are terraced fields, which are much more beautiful than simple farmland. It can even be viewed as a scenic spot. It is so beautiful. If the whole world is so sweet, why not return to nature? 3. Livestock. The second brothers, cows, sheep, chickens, ducks, big geese, and dogs are all kept here. Everyone has their own circle. They do not disturb each other but complement each other. The picture is very strong, and the smell of big dung is exceptionally comfortable~4 .idle. A large screen full of slogans, a large drying field that also plays open-air movies, a strolling village square, and an endless fruit and vegetable field, one more glance will give you more joy~tips:·Wu Village is very large and the height of the village houses is similar. , When shopping, pay attention to control the play time, watch the road signs and don’t get lost. ·It is still not recommended to stay too much in the livestock area, let alone feed!

Very worthwhile place, beautiful environment, not crowded, overall excellent, cost-effective, especially the coffee in the known coffee shop, sitting in front of the beautiful environment, drinking a cup of coffee, it is very good.

Wucun is a small walk. You can go to the northwest corner of Xizha. The accommodation in Wucun is more expensive than Xizha Scenic Area, but the breakfast is provided. There are many experience projects in Wucun. The Internet Conference Site is suspended due to the epidemic.

Wucun, located in the north side of Xizha historic district, is a new, high-end rural tourist resort with the theme of pastoral scenery and the method of leisure resort. Although it is quite commercial, it is very relaxing and comfortable, and is suitable for taking old people or children to relax on holiday for a day or two.

reviews: its a lovely escape from the city for a weekend. Small and walkable. It has nice hotels and restaurants. i ya reachable via train from hangzhou
I am going to this weekend and hopefully can enjoy and peace and quiet feelings.

I have been to Nanxun Ancient Town many times, and I really like its atmosphere. There were few tourists when I went there in the early years. There were basically local residents on both sides of the Hundred Houses, and there were no homestays. I woke up early in the morning and saw villagers carrying two baskets of vegetables for sale. Every time I bought a few catties of embroidery. Bring home the towel. I went to the scenic spot this year and found that there have been big changes. Many scenic spots have been rehabilitated, and there are more and more activities organized by the scenic spots, such as folk performances and ethnic customs displays everywhere. What impresses me most is the local customs. The local people in Nanxun are very enthusiastic, especially the older ones. They will take the initiative to chat with you and tell you the story of old Nanxun. It is recommended to get up in the morning and go to the local noodle shop and tea house in Nanxun. Whether you know them or not, you can sit and talk together. This time I chose to live in a B&B in Baijianlou. It was very quiet at night. The lanterns on the two sides of the river were very artistic. I got up in the morning and opened the window to see the ancient buildings in Baijianlou. I booked the pass for the scenic spot online, and it was definitely worth the money after a day. 80 yuan to visit many large and small scenic spots unimpeded, every place is the imprint of the times, the collision of wealth and fashion, the combination of Chinese and Western deep house compound, magnificent decoration building, can not help but make me want to return to the four elephants. In Niu's time, let's take a look at Nanxun's once rich and enemy country. Tired of walking, I ordered a few special dishes for dinner at a small restaurant in the ancient town, about 50 per person. After a meal, I went to a bar and a street. I felt that there were not many people. In the end, we chose a teahouse near the river to sit and relax, chat, and see the scenery... perfect weekend life!

From Xuancheng Guangde tea, dig oysters back, and went to the ancient town of Nanyue. The ancient town is located in Nanxun District of Huzhou City, at the junction of Jiangsu, Zhejiang and Shanghai, with the unified characteristics of the ancient town in the south of the Yangtze River. The small bridge is flowing with water. The sky is drizzle. The smoke is raining in the south of the Yangtze River. It is very attractive to people to think. The rain is confused. It is vague and misty. The light smoke is floating on the edge of the bridge. Landed in the old town.

The south of the river, into Wuzhen, Tongli and Nanxun, the most impressive is Nanxun, clean and atmosphere, the town layout is neat and not lost the atmosphere of fireworks, the ancient house atmosphere is exquisite and also have, the story of 100 rooms projection let people know the town's past life, The story of the golden dog, which is like eight seventy-two golden dogs, is very wonderful. The preservation of the ancient town and the heritage of the local culture are mutually reinforcing, it is worth two days in the town to taste.

The old post office in Wuzhen is located on the main street, is a typical building of the Republic of China, the old post office is still used today, is a good place to go to Wuzhen card, send a postcard to yourself, or leave a memorial.

The old post office was originally the most popular post office, its history and legacy from the national period, its appearance and internal layout, but young people came here, mostly buying postcards, but no one came in to visit.
The traffic is still quite convenient and the environment is good.

The old post office in Wuzhen retains its history. The original appearance is really ancient. It is very interesting to send a New Year card with a postmark here. Friends from afar will have a different feeling after receiving it.

attractions.name: Banff National Park
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Canadian Rockies, Banff National Park, Banff National Park
reviews: Banff National Park is the oldest national park in Canada and one of the world's 3 national forest parks. Banff National Park is located in the northern Rockies, about 110-180km west of Calgary, Alberta, Canada. The park covers an area of 6641 square kilometers, and is covered with glaciers, hot springs, pine forests and lakes. There are many species of plants and animals in the park.

Banff National Park (Banff National Park) was built in 1885 and is located in the northern part of the Rocky Mountains in Alberta, Canada. It is a national park open all day and main attractions include Lake Louise and Moraine Lake. The park has modern hotels, motels and camping grounds in the forest. The high mountain is also equipped with a suspended cableway, which leads from the bottom to the top of the mountain. There are pavilions and observation decks on the top of the peak, and visitors can lean on a railing and overlook the surrounding scenery.

Banff National Park is quite big, and there is a national park next to it called Yougul, which is very small. There are many things in Banff National Park, you can see all kinds of amber, and there are hiking routes.
Except for the long way away, Banff is really good, just watched the video of classmates skating in Lake Louise, very longing to go again
Canadian is really nice and nice to visit

reviews: People who have been to Banff National Park must have been to Lake Lois, the scenery is beautiful, can take a boat on the lake, just queues and expensive, the hotel by the lake is beautiful, hope to be able to stay for one night

Lake Louise is in Banff National Park in Canada. The area of the lake is quite large. It was almost evening when we went, so the color was not very beautiful, it was beautiful. The color of the lake is also a bit gray.
Banff National Park is probably the most famous national park in Canada, not only attracts many foreign tourists, but many Canadians also like to come here for a holiday, the scenery is beautiful
The scenery of Lois Lake is picturesque and the environment is beautiful!!!

Lake Louise, a famous attraction in Banff National Park in the Canadian Rockies, is a birthday gift from the governor of Canada sent by the British accredited Governor of Canada to his daughter, so it is named after his daughter, which shows how charming the lake is.
Lake Louise is set against the ice peaks of the snowfields. What unfolds in front of you is a clear and bottomless turquoise lake, like a huge emerald. The small boats in the lake are swimming in the ocean, and the water is as calm as a mirror...

attractions.name: Banff
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Alberta, Banff, Banff
reviews: Being from Calgary I have always enjoyed going  for the day and enjoying museums,views,hot springs and the cute shopping district.

[View] The lake is beautiful and the mountains and the shadows are intertwined. [Interest] Stay at the Fairmont Hotel on the edge of Lake Louise. The lake view is out the door. The hotel has complete facilities and many historical stories and cultural relics. [Cost-effective] Beautiful scenery is priceless.
The beauty of Banff cannot be expressed in words, and it is also one of Canada's most famous attractions.

The small town of Banff is located at the foot of the Rocky Mountains and has a resident population of less than 9,000. The houses in the town are mainly made of wood, most of which maintain the architectural style of the 19th century and are very distinctive. The town is a hub leading to various parks and scenic spots. It combines the natural beauty of the Rocky Mountains and modern conveniences. It attracts millions of tourists every year and has become a mountain resort for travelers from all over the world.

As the most famous tourist town in Canada, Banff welcomes many visitors every day. Taking Banff as the center, many sights around Banff National Park can radiate, so most travelers choose to stay in Banff for two or three days. Banff town is also the most lively place, food, shopping and accommodations are very mature, you can also go all day, see the snow mountains, shopping is very pleasant

reviews: How beautiful is Moraine Lake? Only you can see it with your own eyes! Not only is the scenery different in the four seasons, even in the same day, the scenery is also different, and the heights are also different; the entrance of Moraine Lake is generally controlled at around 7-8 o'clock. If you drive by yourself, you must come early to occupy a parking space. , You need to walk a short stone mountain road, about a few hundred meters or less, you can also go down to the lake.

Moraine Lake in Banff National Park in Canada is really beautiful, and it is also very close to the famous Lake Louise. Because too many people come to watch, the parking lot in the lake is limited, so you can enter early every day or Take the designated shuttle bus to see Moraine Lake from the top and bottom. The reflections are very beautiful

I definitely want a 5-star review. It is my favorite lake in Canada. The sun has not risen in the early morning. If the sun is better, the color of the lake will be more beautiful. The lake will circle around for an hour. Right.

Like the name of the lake, it is very poetic! In the late autumn, Canada is already cold in winter, fortunately to be with you in the sunshine. The lake water is exceptionally clear as a mirror. The exceptional tranquility of the valley. The long-awaited trip to North America has begun. [Scenery] [Interesting] [Cost-effective]

People say that Banff is one of the must-visit places in life.
When the car drove into the national park, the eyes were immediately attracted by the scenery outside the window. The mountains, the lake, the trees... as far as you can see, they are all picturesque scenery, really super beautiful! Beautiful view worth wrestling four times.

attractions.name: Icefields Parkway
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Canadian Rockies, Banff National Park, Icefields Parkway
attractions.address: Icefields Pkwy, Improvement District No. 9, AB
reviews: Want to "add" its "most" @ #93 Highway Icefields Parkway Icefield Avenue, which strung together the two national parks of Banff and Jasper, National Geographic said it is the world's most beautiful landscape road. However, the 1992 glacier line can be hundreds of meters away from the current visual observation, and the 19th century glacier line can only be reached in a few minutes by car. To protect the earth, sustainable packaging has a long way to go

The Icefields Avenue in Banff National Park, Canada is the route 93 connecting Banff and Jasper. It is known as "the most beautiful road in the world". It is a tourist attraction along the Icefield Avenue. A silver chain linked by, ice field and snow mountain. Beautiful, Rocky Mountains!

When I went to Banff in early October, there was heavy snowfall. From Jasper to Banff, I really enjoyed the beauty of Icefield Boulevard. There are beautiful snow mountains on both sides. Driving the Wrangler all the way on the flat road, it feels great!

It’s super beautiful, and the Icefield Boulevard is just 200 kilometers away. Although there are not many scenic spots on both sides, as long as there is one scenic spot, you can stroll for several hours and enjoy it slowly. The U-shaped scenic spot of the glass trestle is also here.

To go to Jasper National Principality in Canada, the beautiful Icefield Avenue is a must pass. The Icefield Avenue is known as the most beautiful road in the world. It is surrounded by snowy mountains, woods and grasslands. From time to time, you can see all kinds of animals playing on both sides of the road. !

attractions.name: Sulphur Mountain
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Canadian Rockies, Banff National Park, Sulphur Mountain
reviews:
Sulphur Mountain (Sulphur Mountain) is a mountain located near Banff, Alberta, Canada. It is about 2450 meters above sea level. You can climb the top of Sulphur Mountain and overlook Banff Town, Bow River and Banff Hot Spring Hotel at the foot of the mountain. Lake Minnesota, Canadian Rockies. Sulfur Mountain is named after the sulfur hot springs found on its slopes. You can choose the Banff Gondola (Banff Gondola) or hiking trails to climb the Sulphur Mountain. Hiking up the mountain along the rugged and winding trails is time-consuming, and it usually takes about an hour to reach the top of the mountain. Therefore, tourists usually choose to take the cable car up the mountain, and can enjoy the view of different heights as the cable car rises gradually. The cable car station is located about three kilometers south of Banff town. There are buses from Banff town. The elevation difference of the ropeway is about 680 meters. It takes about 8 minutes to reach the top of the 2,250-meter mountain. Mountain top view
Sulfur Mountain is the best place to overlook Banff Town. There is a four-story building (Upper Terminal) on the top of the mountain. Each floor has different functions, including coffee shops, souvenir shops, and the highest restaurant in Canada. The fourth floor It is an open-air observation deck with a better view. If you walk up the hilltop trail, you can reach a meteorological observatory built in 1903. The building still exists, and visitors can see its interior through the windows.

I didn't report any expectations, it was just an itinerary of the sightseeing bus crossing. But the fact is that the Sulfur Mountain is more shocking than the Hell Valley. The multiple outlets are very foggy and accompanied by an uninterrupted roar. When you squat down and take a closer look, you can see the hot spring water puffing out from the small cave. Chung. And you can walk up to the vent of the sulfur vapor to get close (but be careful not to get too close), and the experience is much better than the Hell Valley that can only be seen from a distance. The large open space next to it and the snow-capped mountains in the distance also form a picture that is very independent and suitable for shooting.

The view of Sulphur Mountain is generally good. The cable car going up the mountain is a bit expensive, equivalent to about RMB 350 per person. There is a well-built trail platform on the mountain that can walk to the highest point, and the length is about a few hundred meters. At the end of the ropeway, there is a Starbucks and a gift shop. There is a stove on the outside of the room where you can grill.

Sulphur Mountain is the main attraction of Banff National Park. It is also a good place to ascend and overlook Banff town and surrounding scenery. Riding the cable car up the mountain is an inevitable choice. There is more than one vantage point on the top of the mountain, and the top of the mountain where the cable car is located is not the highest. You can reach another higher mountain along the mountain road. You can't go there without time. The town of Banff is at the bottom left of the viewing platform, and the hot spring hotel is also in sight. The distant snow-capped mountains in the sun are exceptionally clean against the blue sky, the winding river is shining with golden light, and people's hearts become as broad as the world.

In the calm and tranquil world of ice and snow, the Sulphur Mountain is brisk and cheerful. Above the white snow, the gas spring is surging, the clouds are steaming and the snow is boiling and joy! Stepping on knee-less snow, heading towards the Sulphur Mountain at an altitude of 512 meters. After a few steps, the snow seeps into the shoes~ The Bantang Hot Spring that flows out of the Sulphur Mountain contains strong sulfur and hydrogen sulfide, which is good for curing diseases. Has a miraculous effect. On the other side of Xiangshan, the steam is steaming, and when he turns around, it is the endless tranquil world. The chaos and chaos gradually melted in the snow, and as far as the eyes could be, there were only pure white snow shadows and gleaming sunlight.

attractions.name: Peyto Lake
attractions.loc_tags: North America, Canada, Canadian Rockies, Banff National Park, Peyto Lake
attractions.address: Icefield Parkway, Lake Louise, Banff National Park, Alberta
reviews: The lake is a beautiful landscape, reflected by the melting glaciers and the clear green water of the lake, which is like a king's belt or a maple leaf.

Peyto Lake is a glacial lake in Banff National Park in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta, Canada. It can be reached directly by Icefield Highway. Compared with other lakes in Banff National Park, Peyto Lake is "only to be viewed from a distance and not to be played." Because it is long and narrow and surrounded by steep cliffs and dense forests, there is almost no way to reach the lake, so it can only be seen from a distance from the mountain down. Lake Peto is on the icefield road in Banff, Jasper, and cars can be parked in the parking lot on the hillside or on the hillside. There is still some distance to the mountain viewpoint.
We went in early October. There was a lot of snow a few days ago. There were ice blocks on the way to the viewing point. It felt good to look down on the blue lake. However, the color of this lake is very beautiful, Peyto Lake is like a jasper belt worn on the Rocky Mountain, turquoise blue dripping, adding a lot of beauty to the Rocky Mountain.

Peyto Lake is a glacial barrier lake in Banff National Park in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta, Canada. Peyto Lake is closely connected to the glacier. A large amount of glacial rock powder flows into the lake water, making the lake appear A bright emerald blue. Lake Peto is surrounded by steep cliffs and dense forests, "It can only be seen from a distance, but not to be played", and its shape is a bit like maple leaves or duck claws. Bow Summit is the highest point of the Icefield Highway and the best place to appreciate Peyto Lake. There is a viewing platform on the roadside to see the panoramic view of the lake, the surrounding snow mountains and the glaciers above the lake. The main landscape of Western Canada National Park is the numerous glacial barrier lakes. Among these numerous barrier lakes, Lake Peto is more distinctive and beautiful, so it has become one of the most popular sightseeing spots for tourists.

Peto Lake is between Banff and Jasper. It is a beautiful and blue mountain lake. At that time, it was a good feeling to be covered with white snow. Self-driving car parked in the parking lot below or on the side of the road. You can only see it after walking for a while, the lake view is great and there is a viewing platform on the mountain

Lake Peto, I call it Mengclaw Lake, it is very vivid at first glance. I personally think that it is as amazing as Moraine Lake, although it can only be seen from afar, and only from a distance can its beauty be realized. You can walk to the official viewing platform in ten minutes from the parking lot, but it’s usually overcrowded here. With guardrails, you can’t take pictures at all. So there is also a wild viewing platform—a rock cliff with a better view. People are also more suitable for concave shapes, so we can only solve the road meal here. Let’s talk about this wild viewing platform: when you look back at the official viewing platform, you can see three trails. The two on the left lead to two parking lots. Take the one on the far right, and continue to the trail on the right at a fork. About tens of meters to see the dirt road that someone stepped on on the right hand side, let's go down, follow the dirt road for a few hundred meters and you will be there. Another reminder: the weather on Lake Peto is very changeable. It was sunny just now. It might rain and snow in a blink of an eye, and the temperature is low, so be prepared.

attractions.name: Colorful Pond

reviews: It''s always very crowded. I would recommend to avoid the stairs and access to it from the bottom part of the platform.

The turquoise blue of Wucai Pond and the lake blue of the Rhino Sea formed a strong visual impact. After the earthquake, the Nuorilang Waterfall became more and more majestic. After more than eight hours, I finally rushed from the giant panda base to the most important scenic spot of the trip-Jiuzhaigou Huanglong Scenic Area. It was really tiring, but no one seemed to complain.

Wucai Pond is the essence of Jiuzhaigou lakes. It is the smallest and most colorful pond in Jiuzhaigou. The upper half is azure blue, the lower half is orange-red, the left is sky blue, and the right is olive green. In the lake, there are aquatic plant communities such as Spirogyra, Chara, and Ferns, as well as various herbaceous plants such as reeds, knotweeds, and water wicks.

"Jiuzhai return not to see the water, is the real interpretation of the scenery of Jiuzhaigou. Springs, waterfalls, rivers, beach 108 sea sons, constitute a colorful Dianchi Lake jade basin. Changhai, Jianyan, Nuo Rilang, trees, Zharu, Black Sea six landscapes, in the shape of "Y" distribution. Cuihai, waterfall, colored forest, snow peak, Tibetan feelings, blue ice, known as "Six Excellent"

I have long heard that Wucai Pond is not as good as before. Going today, I was a little disappointed, mainly because the plank road below was submerged by the pool water and I couldn't go down.
In this way, shooting on the plank road above, the obvious position, the view is not good. And there are many trees blocking it, unable to find the right angle.
Moreover, the colors of the current Wucai Pond are not so bright, mainly blue, light blue, and dark green.

reviews: the most beautiful place visited
One of my favorite lakes. Try to go to the end of the platform where there are less tourist and you can take nicer pics or chill out and enjoy the scenery.

The surrounding hillsides are covered in a beautiful autumn color, rich in color, with a thousand gestures, colorful flowers = leaves, many of them are on the lake near the outlet, one color = leaves, mixed in brocade, such as flames of gold, reflected in the water

Wuhuahai is a famous scenic spot in Jiuzhaigou, famous for its colorful variety in the four seasons. The Wuhuahai, which is known as the "Jiuzhaigou one of the best" and "Jiuzhai essence", is located at the end of the upper reaches of the Peacock River in Rizegou.

The next stop after the panda sea is the sea of flowers, here is a business card of Jiuzhaigou scenic spot, a lake in blue, green, orange yellow, light red, like countless gems inlaid, in the sunlight under the color waves, gorgeous, known as "Jiuzhai essence".

attractions.name: Changhai
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Changhai
attractions.address: Jiuzhaigou Scenic Spot, Zhangzha Town, Jiuzhaigou County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: After having lunch in the Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area, we took a sightseeing bus at the Nuorilang Tourist Service Center and started to tour the left side of Jiuzhaigou’s ‘Y’ shape, and the final point was Changhai. This is the highest scenic spot in Jiuzhaigou and Haizi with the largest area. Highlights: The lake is like a mirror, the water and the sky are the same, the best time to visit and time reference: afternoon, 30 minutes. Changhai is located at the end of Zechawa Valley. The peaks next to Changhai are covered with snow all year round, surrounded by verdant forests. Standing on the Changhai viewing platform, you can see the blue sky, white clouds, and snowy peaks. You can see the mountains and the sky are connected to each other. Without distance, this is also a great sight of Changhai. Pace down the wooden plank road next to the viewing platform and come to the pool of green jade. Watching the Long Sea up close, you feel that the lake is as wide as the sea, the lake is as dark and green as jade, the green hills are towering into the clouds, and the clouds are like illusion...When visiting the Changhai, you should pay attention to a juniper cypress on the coast with a strange shape and branches and leaves on one side. The other side is as bald as a knife, and is called the one-armed old cypress. There are signs indicating that the long sea water is like a bright mirror. The ice bucket and the "U"-shaped valley on the opposite side are vividly vivid, with lush forests and lofty peaks. , Bathed in blue sky and white clouds, magnificent and beautiful. The long sea view is the beauty from the heart, so you can arrange more time to stop and admire it.

Changhai is the largest sea in Jiuzhaigou. The long sea bends along the mountains, hiding its head deep in the valley of mountains. The mountain peaks at the end of the Changhai Sea are covered with snow all year round, covered with silver makeup, and are above 4000-5000 meters above sea level.
Nice scenery, beautiful environment, clean air 😊

Haizi is the largest in Jiuzhaigou Valley with the largest water storage capacity. It is more than 3,000 meters above sea level, surrounded by mountains, lush vegetation, and beautiful natural scenery. It is a pity that the weather is not good and the photo effect is not ideal.
The long sea, which is five kilometers long, is recharged by snow melt and rain. It is also called the everlasting bougainvillea, which is always filled with dissatisfaction and always dew-dry.

attractions.name: Nuorilang Waterfall
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Nuorilang Waterfall
attractions.address: Jiubahaigou Scenic Spot, Yuzha Town, Jiuzhaigou County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: The restoration after Jiuzhaigou earthquake is mainly natural recovery and artificial intervention, but in two years, after thousands of years of calcium erosion, the Nourilang Cascade Falls, how to get a new life after the earthquake, the first scene

Nuorilang Waterfall is 2,365 meters above sea level and 270 meters wide. It is one of the large calcification waterfalls in China and is also the widest waterfall in China. The scenery is charming, and many TV dramas have been taking pictures here.

In Jiuzhaigou, there are several waterfalls. Pearl Beach Waterfall, Shuzhen Waterfall, Ruorilang Waterfall. Among them, Nuorilang Waterfall is the widest and largest. And if you go in autumn, there will be red leaves. It looks very beautiful in this way, no matter what the angle is, it is very good.

Nuorilang Waterfall is located in Jiuzhaigou Valley, Sichuan Province, China. It is 2365 meters above sea level, 270 meters wide and 24.5 meters high. It is one of China's large calcified waterfalls and the widest waterfall in China. In Tibetan, Nuorilang means stalwart and tall, so Nuorilang Waterfall means majestic waterfall.

One of the three major waterfalls in Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area. It is located at the junction of Rize Valley and Shuzheng Valley. It is directly accessible by environmental protection buses and has convenient transportation. Its waterfall surface is more than 100 meters wide and has plenty of water. The 86 CCTV version of "Journey to the West" 》The location was filmed here.

attractions.name: Virgin forest
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Virgin forest
attractions.address: Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area, Zhangzha Town, Jiuzhaigou County, Aba Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture
reviews: Jiuzhaigou's primeval forest scenic spot, after the earthquake did not open. Look at a dark dense pine and cypress primeval forest, very spectacular. The next side of the snowy mountains, sea, blue sky in the forest against the background, look more beautiful.

It is located in the deepest part of Rize Valley and is also the farthest scenic spot that can be reached by environmental buses. It is composed of mountains and pine forests. It is an ecological barrier in northwestern Sichuan, conserving water sources and blocking cold air and sand.
Jiuzhaigou is a national park, the scenery is not wrong, everyone can go to see.
The environment is good, the air is good, it is worth going.
I must visit Jiuzhaigou once in my life. The water of Jiuzhaigou is the soul here, and the bushes are the most beautiful scenery in Jiuzhaigou. I like everything here.

attractions.name: Shenxianchi Scenic Area
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Shenxianchi Scenic Area
attractions.address: Z127, Jiuzhaigou Xian, Aba Zangzuqiangzuzizhizhou, Sichuan Sheng, China
reviews: The landscape of calcium carbonate deposits in the scenic spot is very shocking, as pure as the sea, plus the original forest landscape, it is very distinctive. The entire scenic area is newly constructed and the instructions are clear. Although it takes an hour and a half to drive from Jiuzhaigou, the 300 round-trip chartered car is expensive, but it is worth

The Shenxianchi Scenic Area beside Minshan Mountain is a newly opened spot in the area. It is surrounded by mountains and has lush vegetation. The Huacai landform is similar to Jiuzhaigou and Huanglonggou. The natural scenery is beautiful, the transportation is not very convenient, and there are not many tourists.
A very recommended scenic spot, with few people and beautiful scenery! It's a bit aesthetic fatigue after going to Jiuzhaigou!
The Shenxian Pool is located in Jiuzhaigou and consists of a peculiar basin-shaped calcified pool.

I chartered a car to the scenic area, 15 kilometers to the fork, then up the mountain for more than 20 kilometers, down the mountain for more than 20 kilometers, a total of 45 kilometers of mountain roads, over a mountain, the top of the mountain is 3604 meters above sea level, and there are 28 nightmarish turns on the way. , The whole journey is 6 kilometers, that is, there is an average of more than 200 meters. There is a bend. According to the map I posted, the navigation shows that it takes nearly 4 hours. I chartered a car for one and a half hours, and the mountain road is one hour. Because the mountain road is narrow and it is cement There are many pits on the road. It is recommended to charter a car with a local driver who is familiar with mountain roads. Self-driving is very unsafe. When you arrive at the scenic spot, the fare is 100, and the scenic spot battery car is 24. In fact, it is about one kilometer in the road. It is recommended not to buy a battery ticket. I don’t know if there is a peak or off-season here. Anyway, there were not many people going there on September 30, which was related to the bad walking on the mountain road. The main attractions are Shuiliandong, Jinyintan, Yaochi, Qinglonghai, Liantai Caichi, Shenwahai, beaches and ponds are karst landforms, mainly formed by calcification, Shuiliandong is actually something similar to a waterfall, the sea It is a small lake, which is beautiful when there is sun. See the photos for details. Usually the tour can end in three hours. Things to pay attention to, the first half of the journey is mountain climbing. Those with poor physical strength need to be adjusted. There is only a toilet in Shuiliandong on the way. Female friends should not drink too much water. There is no place to buy water and food in the scenic area. You need to bring your own. The scenic spot is still under development, and other scenic spots are gradually improving. At present, there are fewer tourists and it is worth visiting.

attractions.name: Zhenzhutan Waterfall
attractions.loc_tags: Asia, China, Sichuan, Abazhou, Jiuzhaigou, Zhenzhutan Waterfall
reviews: It is the place where the monks and disciples of the Tang Dynasty wading the water with horses in the opening of the "Journey to the West", surrounded by trees such as pine and fir, there is a dense green corridor to the waterfall. Pearl Beach waterfall is 200 meters wide, the maximum fall can reach 40 meters, gas-heated extraordinary, majestic.

Visit the Pearl Beach in Jiuzhaigou Scenic Area and take pictures by walking on the wooden plank road. Remember to go down the plank road all the way. Don't take a sightseeing car and return. You can walk straight to the Pearl Beach waterfall. This is the place where the four masters and apprentices wade through the water at the end of the 86 version of CCTV "Journey to the West". It is one of the most spectacular waterfalls in Jiuzhaigou. Countless small drops of water were stirred up and turned into confused water mist, which was very powerful. Although the water is not small, it is still somewhat demure and beautiful. You can also see the gorgeous rainbow under the sunlight, which is definitely one of the most essential attractions in Jiuzhaigou. The water rushing from the Pearl Beach rolled down from the edge of the cliff, forming a wide crescent-shaped waterfall. The waterfall fell to the bottom of the valley with a deafening roar, forming a torrent of violent splashes. This torrent is all the torrents of Jiuzhaigou. The middle water color is the most beautiful, the water is the most urgent, and the water is loudest. The content of negative oxygen ions in the Pearl Beach Waterfall is extremely rich, which is hundreds of times higher than that in the plain area. It is known as the "natural oxygen bar". There is a winding plank road on the left side of the rapids, which is the best angle to watch the waterfall and take photos. Continue east along the plank road in the direction of the rapids, and you will reach Pearl Beach.

The Pearl Beach Waterfall is 2443 meters above sea level, 21 meters high and 162 meters wide. It is a typical combined landscape in Jiuzhaigou. The upper beach flow flows from the table to the lower Danzugou, forming a spectacular waterfall. The waterfall is divided into several strands by the crescent-shaped rock mass, or silver curtains are flying, or white waves are rolling, or like beads like lines, rushing and rushing to the bottom of the stream, rushing down noisily. The Pearl Beach Waterfall is 200 meters wide and has a maximum drop of 40 meters. It is extraordinary and majestic.

Jiuzhaigou, Pearl Beach Waterfall. The location where the Journey to the West was shot. Very beautiful and spectacular. It is recommended to walk there, after watching from Wuhuahai, do not take a car, walking over is very beautiful. You can feel the waterfall up close.
The views are very nice and worth a visit again.

reviews: Wonderful experience.  We booked the comfort package.  This included a reservation in the restaurant.  We arrived for 9 am, spent 2 hours then went for our reservation when the restaursnt opened at 11:30.  This was nice as we got a table rigjt at the window.  Our daughter was free  (13 years old) which was great.  it would have saved some confusion and time if they had told us thst children don’t get thir own lockers.  Also, don’t put your towel/things on the rocks (hang  them) as they will be moved and there was some panic as to where our stuff was.
like paradise on earth would recomend anyone visting to pay and spend a day relaxing in the warmth
the most beautiful spot!!!!never get tired of this view!!!!!
Deep blue sea, fantastic nature

Blue Lake is the largest hot spring in Iceland, is still one of the most famous geothermal hot springs in the world, and is also the most clear lake in the world, snow can also soak in hot springs, with the reputation of "natural beauty salon". After a flight of 10 hours, tired and hot springs in the Blue Lake are the most exciting thing to do

attractions.name: Thingvellir National Park
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Iceland, Greater Reykjavik, Reykjavik, Thingvellir National Park
reviews:
Congress Site National Park
Recommendation index🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
📍Location: Thingvellir National Park, Reykjavik, Iceland
🚌Mode of transportation: chartered
🏞Recommended route: Golden Circle route
🌈Recommended travel season: If the holiday allows, it is recommended to choose summer, the scenery is better.
🎫Ticket: 🆓Open for free
🅿️Parking: You need to charge according to the size of the vehicle.
🚻Toilet:🆓free
Only at the entrance, the restroom at the next destination of the Golden Circle trip is in the geyser.
⌚️Play time: 2 hours
📝Travel tips:
🔸Because I went on the National Day holiday, it happened to be autumn. The viewing platform was located on a high place and it was very windy, so pay attention to the work of windproof and warmth.
🔹Along the way down the viewing platform, you can hardly miss any sights. The most famous ones are the rift valleys of Eurasia and the American continent and the old parliament site.
🔸Although the prices are more expensive, it is recommended to buy your favorite souvenirs at the souvenir shop. Because although there are a lot of souvenir shops, the shops are different.

This is the first stop of the Icelandic Golden Circle. You must check in when you travel to Iceland. There is nothing on the surface, but it is very unusual here. Not only can I understand the history of Iceland, but also the geological structure of Iceland and learn a lot.

The first stop of the Golden Circle travel route in southern Iceland, in addition to being a natural national park, is also the birthplace of the Icelandic Parliament. There is a charge for the parking lot, and you can pay by swiping your card at the self-parking machine. It is suitable for hiking in good weather and the air is good.

Come here to watch the sunrise, the sunrise time here is 10:50. Here is also the junction of the Eurasian and American plates, with a domineering foot on the two plates. The morning glow before sunrise is more beautiful, with black lava covered in snow. The plants here are bryophytes.

Singerville National Park in Iceland is one of the most famous attractions in the Golden Circle. It's a cold winter, with a thick layer of ice and a vast white sea of snow. Next time I want to wait for the summer, I can see a large green moss, different sights, and can snorkel. All in all, Singhville National Park is a must-see in Iceland's lifetime, and the world heritage is truly famous.

Into the hall, Jesus hands on his chest and watch the prayers of the living, smooth, kind, kind, gentle...

attractions.name: The Northern Light Center
attractions.loc_tags: Europe, Iceland, Greater Reykjavik, Reykjavik, The Northern Light Center
reviews: The Northern Lights Center in Reykjavik, Iceland, is the most active period of aurora around the Spring Festival. Taking this opportunity to take a trip to chase the aurora will definitely be an indelible memory. In addition, the mysterious blue ice cave has become a common place for many photographers to shoot blockbusters. The experience of hiking on the glacier makes many extreme sports enthusiasts unstoppable. The unique geyser also attracts many travel enthusiasts. The beautiful natural scenery of Iceland has been listed as a must-visit place in a lifetime by many authoritative magazines, media and travel enthusiasts in the world. It can be said to be great!

I was lucky to see the Northern Lights for three days in a row, because I went there in September, which is not the time when the Northern Lights appear intensively. I was already disappointed, so I drank at the bar at ease. I don’t know anyone yelled "Aurora Borealis" at 11:30 in the night. Everyone ran to the beach. They didn’t prepare, so the filming was done like this. I regretted it for the rest of my life. On the second day and the third day, the aurora appeared less than the first day.

The Northern Lights Center is a small glass building, but every time you see the Aurora in the Golden Circle, you will definitely be there. The surroundings are relatively deserted, with some rooms made of containers. We are very happy to see the aurora here

The most yearning thing in Iceland is the glacier and the extreme scouring. Aurora is quite a matter of luck. We are very lucky to be able to see Aurora. It is said that if you are extremely reluctant to make a wish, it will be easier and more affordable. You should also try

Iceland, people go there to appreciate its spectacular sights and witness the wonders of the aurora. If you have the opportunity to visit Iceland, be sure to see the fascinating northern lights and capture the ever-changing super "electric light show", you will also completely fall in love with the northern lights!

attractions.name: Icelandic Phallological Museum
